SA15dhkprvku:02004_1: bhāvād eva asya tad-bhāve svarūpasya svato gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02008_0: nityaṃ pramāṇaṃ na eva asti prāmāṇyād vastu-saṃgateḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02009_1: kathaṃcin na upakāryatvād anitye apy apramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:02010_1: iṣṭasiddhir asiddhir vā dṛṣṭānte saṃśayo athavā
SA15dhkprvku:02011_1: saṃniveśa-ādi tad yuktaṃ asmād yad anumīyate
SA15dhkprvku:02012_1: na yuktā anumitiḥ pāṇḍu-dravyād iva hutāśane
SA15dhkprvku:02013_1: ghaṭa-ādeḥ karaṇāt sidhyed valmīkasya api tat-kṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02014_0: sādhyena anugamāt kārye sāmānyena api sādhane
SA15dhkprvku:02015_1: na yuktaṃ sādhanaṃ gotvāc śabda-ādīnāṃ viṣāṇi-vat
SA15dhkprvku:02016_0: vivakṣā-paratantratvān na śabdāḥ santi kutra vā
SA15dhkprvku:02016_1: tad-bhāvād artha-siddhau tu sarvaṃ sarvasya sidhyai
SA15dhkprvku:02018_0: vastu-svarūpe asiddhe ayaṃ nyāyaḥ siddhe viśeṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:02019_0: asiddhāv api śabdasya siddhe vastuni sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:02020_0: tasya eva vyabhicāra-ādau śabde apy avyabhicāriṇī
SA15dhkprvku:02021_0: yathā tat kāraṇaṃ vastu tathā eva tad-akāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:02021_1: yadā ta kāraṇaṃ kena mataṃ na iṣṭam akāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:02022_1: asambaddhasya kiṃ sthāṇoḥ kāraṇatvaṃ na kalpyate
SA15dhkprvku:02023_0: svabhāva-bhedena vinā vyāpāro api na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:02024_0: yeṣu satsu bhavaty eva yat tebhyo anyasya kalpane
SA15dhkprvku:02026_1: buddher hetus tathā idaṃ cen na tatra api viśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02027_1: saṃhatāv apy asāmarthyaṃ syāt siddho atiśayas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02028_0: tasmāt pṛthag aśakteṣu yeṣu sambhāvyate guṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02028_1: saṃhatau hetutā teṣāṃ na īśvara-āder abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02029_0: prāmāṇyaṃ ca parokṣa-artha-jñānaṃ tat sādhanasya ca
SA15dhkprvku:02029_1: abhāvān na asty anuṣṭhānam iti kecit pracakṣate
SA15dhkprvku:02032_1: yaḥ pramāṇam asāv iṣṭo na tu sarvasya vedakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02033_0: dūraṃ paśyatu vā mā vā tattvam iṣṭaṃ tu paśyatu
SA15dhkprvku:02033_1: pramāṇaṃ dūra-darśī ced eta gṛdhrān upāsmahe
SA15dhkprvku:02034_1: asiddho abhyāsa iti cen na āśraya-pratiṣedhataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02036_1: kim āsīt tasya yan na asti paścād yena na sandhimat
SA15dhkprvku:02037_0: na sa kaścit pṛthivy-āder aṃśo yatra na jantavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02038_1: pariṇāmo yathā ekasya syāt sarvasya aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02039_0: pratyekam upadhāte api na indriyāṇāṃ mano mateḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02039_1: upaghāto asti bhaṅge asyās teṣāṃ bhaṅgaś ca dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:02040_0: tasmāt sthity-āśrayo buddher buddhim eva samāśritaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02040_1: kaścin nimittam akṣāṇāṃ tasmād akṣāṇi buddhitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02041_0: yādṛśy-ākṣepikā sā āsīt paścād apy astu tādṛśī
SA15dhkprvku:02042_0: yady apy akṣair vinā buddhir na tāny api tayā vinā
SA15dhkprvku:02042_1: tathā apy anyonya-hetutvaṃ tato apy anyonya-hetuke
SA15dhkprvku:02043_0: na akramāt kramiṇo bhāvo na apy apekṣā aviśeṣiṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02043_1: kramād bhāvantī dhīḥ kāyāt kramaṃ tasya api śaṃsati
SA15dhkprvku:02044_0: pratikṣaṇam apūrvasya pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ kṣaṇo bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:02044_1: tasya hetur ato hetur dṛṣṭa eva astu sarvadā
SA15dhkprvku:02045_1: tadvad apy arthataś cittam asandhānaṃ kuto matam
SA15dhkprvku:02046_1: hetor vaikalyatas tac cet kiṃ tad eva atra na uditam
SA15dhkprvku:02047_0: tad-dhī-vad grahaṇa-prāpter mano-jñānaṃ na sa indriyāt
SA15dhkprvku:02049_1: sa hetuḥ saptamī tasmād utpādād iti ca ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:02050_0: astu upakārako vā api kadācic citta-santateḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02051_1: tad-bhāve bhāvād vaśyatvāt prāṇa-apānau tato na tat
SA15dhkprvku:02053_0: tulyaḥ prasaṅgo api tayor na tulyaṃ citta-kāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:02053_1: sthity-āvedhakam anyac ca yataḥ kāraṇam iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:02054_0: na doṣair viguṇo deho hetur varty-ādi-vad yadi
SA15dhkprvku:02054_1: mṛte śamīkṛte doṣe punar ujjīvanaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:02055_1: tasya anivṛttir iti cen na cikitsā-prayogataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02057_0: ādyasya anyo apy asaṃhāryaḥ pratyāneyas tu yat kṛtaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02057_1: vikāraḥ syāt punarbhāvaḥ tasya hemni kharatva-vat
SA15dhkprvku:02058_1: āyuḥ kṣayād vā doṣe tu kevale na asty asādhyatā
SA15dhkprvku:02059_0: mṛte viṣa-ādi-saṃhārāt tad daṃśac chedato api vā
SA15dhkprvku:02059_1: vikāra-hetor vigame sa na ucchvasiti kiṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02061_0: avikṛtya hi yad vastu yaḥ padārtho vikāryate
SA15dhkprvku:02061_1: upādānaṃ na tat tasya yuktaṃ go-gavaya-ādivat
SA15dhkprvku:02063_1: sataś ced āśrayo na asyāḥ sthātur avyatirekataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02064_0: vyatireke api tad-hetus tena bhāvasya kiṃ kṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:02065_0: tulyaḥ prasaṅgas tatra api kiṃ punaḥ sthiti-hetunā
SA15dhkprvku:02066_0: nāśasya satya-bādho asāv iti kiṃ sthiti-hetunā
SA15dhkprvku:02066_1: yathā jala-āder ādhāra iti cet tulyam atra ca
SA15dhkprvku:02067_1: tathā utpatteḥ sahetutvād āśrayo ayuktam anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:02069_0: etena samavāyaś ca samavāyī ca kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:02070_0: parato bhāva-nāśaś cet tasya kiṃ sthiti-hetunā
SA15dhkprvku:02070_1: sa vinaśyed vinā apy anyairn na śaktāḥ sthiti-hetavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02071_0: sthitimān sāśrayaḥ sarvaḥ sarva-utpattau ca sāśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02071_1: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya na vināśaḥ kadācana
SA15dhkprvku:02072_0: svayaṃ vinaśvara-ātmā cet tasya kaḥ sthāpakaḥ paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02072_1: svayaṃ na naśvara-ātmā cet tasya kaḥ sthāpakaḥ paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02074_1: syāt tato api viśeṣo asya na citte anupakāriṇi
SA15dhkprvku:02078_0: tasmāt svasya eva saṃskāraṃ niyamena anuvartate
SA15dhkprvku:02079_0: kālena vyajyate abhedāt syād dehe api tato guṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02081_0: janmino yasya te na sto na sa janma adhigacchati
SA15dhkprvku:02081_1: gaty-āgatī na dṛṣṭe ced indriyāṇām apāṭavāt
SA15dhkprvku:02082_1: tanutvān mūrtam api tu kiṃcit kvacid aśaktimat
SA15dhkprvku:02083_0: jala-vat sūta-vad hemni na adṛṣṭer asad eva vā
SA15dhkprvku:02084_0: ekasmin karmaṇo ayogāt syāt pṛthak siddhir anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:02084_1: ekasya ca āvṛttau sarvasya āvṛttiḥ syād anāvṛttau
SA15dhkprvku:02085_0: dṛśyeta rakte ca ekasmin rāgo araktasya vā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02085_1: na asty eka-samudāyo asmād anekatve api pūrvavat
SA15dhkprvku:02086_0: aviśeṣād aṇutvāc ca na gatiś cen na sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:02088_0: dṛśyaṃ pṛthag aśaktānām akṣa-ādīnāṃ gatiḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:02088_1: saṃyogāc cet samāno atra prasaṅgo hema-sūtayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02089_0: dṛśyaḥ saṃyoga iti cet kuto adṛṣṭa-āśraye gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02090_0: iṣṭas/ ced buddhi-bhedo astu paṅktir dīrghā iti vā katham
SA15dhkprvku:02091_0: abhilāpāc ca bhedena rūpaṃ buddhau na bhāsate
SA15dhkprvku:02092_0: guṇa-ādiṣv iva kalpya-arthe naṣṭa-ajāteṣu vā yathā
SA15dhkprvku:02092_1: mato yady upacāro atra sa iṣṭo yan nibandhanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02093_0: sa eva sarva-bhāveṣu hetuḥ kiṃ na iṣyate tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02094_0: mukhyam ity eva ca kuto abhinne bhinna-arthatā iti cet
SA15dhkprvku:02095_0: saṃkhyā-ādi-yoginaḥ śabdās tatra apy artha-antaraṃ yadi
SA15dhkprvku:02096_1: vyatirekī iva yac ca api sūcyate bhāva-vācibhiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02097_1: śrutis tan-mātra-jijñāsor na vā kṣipta-akhilā parā
SA15dhkprvku:02098_0: bhinnaṃ dharmam iva ācaṣṭe yogo aṅgulyā iti kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:02098_1: yuktā aṅgulī iti sarveṣām ākṣepād dharmi-vācinī
SA15dhkprvku:02100_1: ato na rūpaṃ ghaṭa ity eka-adhikaraṇā śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02102_0: tac-śakti-bhedāḥ khyāpyante vācyo anyo apy anayā diśā
SA15dhkprvku:02102_1: hetutve ca samastānām eka-aṅga-vikale api na
SA15dhkprvku:02104_1: na aneka-hetur iti cen na aviśeṣāt kramād api
SA15dhkprvku:02105_0: na eka-prāṇe apy aneka-artha-grahaṇān niyamas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02105_1: ekayā aneka-vijñāne buddhyā astu sakṛd eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:02106_0: avirodhāt krameṇa api mā bhūt tad-aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02107_0: tādṛśām eva cittānāṃ kalpyante yadi kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:02107_1: kramavantaḥ kathaṃ te syuḥ krama-vad hetunā vinā
SA15dhkprvku:02108_1: tad hetus tādṛśo na asti sati vā anekatā dhruvam
SA15dhkprvku:02110_0: ekasya api na vaikalye syān manda-śvasita-ādiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:02110_1: atha hetur yathābhāvaṃ jñāne api syād viśiṣṭatā
SA15dhkprvku:02111_0: na hi tat tasya kāryaṃ yady asya bhedān na bhidyate
SA15dhkprvku:02112_1: śarīrāt sakṛd utpannā dhīḥ sva-jātyā niyamyate
SA15dhkprvku:02113_0: parataś cet samarthasya dehasya viratiḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02113_1: anāśrayān nivṛtte syāc śarīre cetasaḥ sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02116_1: dṛṣṭā ca śaktiḥ pūrveṣām indriyāṇāṃ sva-jātiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:02117_1: śarīrād yadi taj-janma prasaṅgaḥ pūrvavad bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:02118_0: cittāc cet tata eva astu janma deha-antarasya ca
SA15dhkprvku:02119_0: asandhir īdṛśaṃ tena śeṣavat sādhanaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:02120_0: svabhāva-atikramo mā bhūd iti ced āhitaḥ sa cet
SA15dhkprvku:02120_1: punar yatnam apekṣeta yadi syāt asthira-āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02121_0: viśeṣo na eva bardheta svabhāvaś ca na tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02122_1: viśeṣasya asvabhāvatvād vṛddhāv apy āhito yadā
SA15dhkprvku:02123_0: na apekṣeta punar yatnaṃ yatno anyaḥ syād viśeṣa-kṛt
SA15dhkprvku:02124_1: tasmāt sa teṣām utpannaḥ svabhāvo jāyate guṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02126_0: kṛpā-ādi-buddhayas tāsāṃ saty abhyāse kutaḥ sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02126_1: na ca evaṃ laṅghanād eva laṅghanaṃ bala-yatnayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02128_0: śanair yatnena vaiguṇye niraste sva-bale sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02129_0: vipakṣair bādhyate cet te prayāty atyanta-sātmatām
SA15dhkprvku:02129_1: tathā hi mūlam abhyāsaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ parasya tu
SA15dhkprvku:02133_0: tasya anitya-ādi-rūpāṃ ca duḥkhasya eva viśeṣaṇaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02133_1: yatas tathā sthite hetau nivṛttir na iti paśyati
SA15dhkprvku:02136_0: bahuśo bahudhā upāyaṃ kālena bahunā asya ca
SA15dhkprvku:02137_0: buddheś ca pāṭavād hetor vāsanātaḥ prahīyate
SA15dhkprvku:02138_0: upāya-abhyāsa eva ayaṃ tādarthyāc śāsanaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:02138_1: niṣpatteḥ prathamaṃ bhāvād hetur uktam idaṃ dvayam
SA15dhkprvku:02139_1: duḥkhasya śastaṃ nairātmya-dṛṣṭes tad yuktito api vā
SA15dhkprvku:02142_1: na ity eke vyatireko asya sandigdha-avyabhicāry ataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02145_0: tāyaḥ sva-dṛṣṭa-mārga-uktir vaiphalyād vakti na anṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:02148_0: adoṣaś cet tad-anyo api dharmaḥ kiṃ tasya na īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:02149_0: rūpa-ādi-vad adoṣaś cet tulyaṃ tatra api codanam
SA15dhkprvku:02149_1: ādhipatyaṃ viśiṣṭānāṃ yadi tatra na karmaṇām
SA15dhkprvku:02150_0: viśeṣe api ca doṣānām aviśeṣād asiddhatā
SA15dhkprvku:02150_1: na vikārād vikāreṇa sarveṣāṃ na ca sarvajāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02151_0: kāraṇe vardhamāne ca kārya-hānirn na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:02151_1: tāpa-ādiṣv iva rāga-āder vikāro api sukha-ādi-jaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02152_1: vācyaṃ kena udbhavaḥ sāmyān mada-vṛddhiḥ smaras tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02153_0: rāgī viṣam adoṣo api dṛṣṭaḥ sāmye api na aparaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02153_1: kṣayād asṛk-sruto apy anye na eka-strī-niyato madaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02154_0: te na ekasyāṃ na tīvraḥ syāt aṅga-rūpa-ādy api iti cet
SA15dhkprvku:02154_1: na sarveṣām anekāntān na ca apy aniyato bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:02155_0: aguṇa-grāhiṇo api syād aṅgaṃ so api guṇa-grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02155_1: yadi sarvā guṇa-grāhī syād hetor aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02156_0: yad avastho mato rāgī na dveṣī syāc ca tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02156_1: tayor asamarūpatvān niyamaś ca atra na īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:02157_1: yasya rāga-ādayas tasya na ete doṣāḥ prasaṅginaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02159_0: tad-upādāya śabdaś ca hetv-arthaḥ svāśrayeṇa ca
SA15dhkprvku:02160_0: mada-ādi-śakter iva ced vinirbhāgo na vastunaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02160_1: śaktir artha-antaraṃ vastu naśyen na āśritam āśraye
SA15dhkprvku:02161_0: tiṣṭhaty avikale yāti tat-tulyaṃ cen na bhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02162_0: āvikāraṃ ca kāyasya tulya-rūpaṃ bhaven manaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02163_1: jñānaṃ syāt kasyacit kiṃcit kadācit tena kiṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:02165_0: etat sāṃkhya-paśoḥ ko anyaḥ salajjo vaktum īhate
SA15dhkprvku:02165_1: adṛṣṭa-pūrvam asti iti tṛṇa-agre kariṇāṃ śatam
SA15dhkprvku:02166_0: yad rūpaṃ dṛśyatāṃ yātaṃ tad rūpaṃ prāṅ na dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:02166_1: śatadhā viprakīrṇe api hetau tad vidyate katham
SA15dhkprvku:02168_0: sarvaḥ samāna-rāgaḥ syād bhūta-atiśayato na cet
SA15dhkprvku:02168_1: bhūtānāṃ prāṇitā-bhede apy ayaṃ bhedo yad āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02170_0: sarvatra rāgaḥ sadṛśaḥ syād hetoḥ sadṛśā-ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02170_1: na hi go-pratyayasya asti samāna-artha-bhuvaḥ kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:02171_0: tāratamyaṃ pṛthivy-ādau prāṇitā-āder iha api vā
SA15dhkprvku:02171_1: auṣṇyasya tāratamye api na anuṣṇo agniḥ kadācana
SA15dhkprvku:02172_0: tathā iha api iti cen na agner auṣṇyād bheda-niṣedhataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02176_1: duḥkhaṃ hetu-vaśatvāc ca na ca ātmā na apy adhiṣṭhitam
SA15dhkprvku:02177_0: na akāraṇam adhiṣṭhātā nityaṃ vā janakaṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:02177_1: tasmād anekam ekasmād bhinna-kālaṃ na jāyate
SA15dhkprvku:02178_1: hetv-antara-anumānaṃ syān na etan nityeṣu vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:02179_1: nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā ahetor anya-anapekṣaṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:02180_0: taikṣṇya-ādīnāṃ yathā na asti kāraṇaṃ kaṇḍaka-ādiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:02180_1: tathā akāraṇam etat syād iti kecit pracakṣate
SA15dhkprvku:02181_0: saty eva yasmin yaj janma vikāre vā api vikriyā
SA15dhkprvku:02181_1: tat tasya kāraṇaṃ prāhus tat teṣām api vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:02182_1: nityānāṃ pratiṣedhena na īśvara-ādeś ca sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02184_1: yato api prāṇinaḥ kāma-vibhava-icche ca te mate
SA15dhkprvku:02187_1: imān tu yuktiman vicchan bādhate sva-mataṃ svayam
SA15dhkprvku:02188_1: sabhāga-jāteḥ prāk siddhiḥ kāraṇatve api na uditam
SA15dhkprvku:02189_0: ajñānam uktā tṛṣṇā eva santāna-preraṇād bhave
SA15dhkprvku:02189_1: ānantaryān na karma api sati tasminn asambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:02191_0: yāvad ātmani na premṇo hāniḥ sa paritasyati
SA15dhkprvku:02191_1: tāvad duḥkhitam āropya na ca svastho avatiṣṭhate
SA15dhkprvku:02196_0: mohaś ca mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sa ca sattva-graho vinā
SA15dhkprvku:02196_1: tena ādya-hetau na dveṣo na doṣo ataḥ kṛpā matā
SA15dhkprvku:02197_1: akṣīṇa-śaktiḥ saṃskāro yeṣāṃ tiṣṭhanti te anaghāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02198_0: mandatvāt karuṇāyāś ca na yatnaḥ sthāpane mahān
SA15dhkprvku:02198_1: tiṣṭhanty eva para-adhīnāḥ yeṣāṃ tu mahatī kṛpā
SA15dhkprvku:02199_0: satkāyadṛṣṭer vigamād ādya eva abhavo bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:02199_1: mārge cet sahaja-ahāner na hānau vā bhavaḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02200_0: sukhī bhave ayaṃ duḥkhī vā mā bhūvam iti tṛṣyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02200_1: yā eva aham iti dhīḥ sā eva sahajaṃ sattva-darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:02201_0: na hy apaśyann aham iti snihyaty ātmani kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:02201_1: na ca ātmani vinā premṇā sukha-kāmo abhidhāvati
SA15dhkprvku:02202_0: duḥkha-utpādasya hetutvaṃ bandho nityasya tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02203_0: anityatvena yo avācyaḥ sa heturn na hi kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:02203_1: bandha-mokṣāv avācye api na vidyete kathaṃ ca na
SA15dhkprvku:02204_0: nityaṃ tam āhur vidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati
SA15dhkprvku:02204_1: tyaktvā imāṃ hrepaṇīṃ dṛṣṭim ato nityaḥ sa ucyatām
SA15dhkprvku:02205_0: ukto mārgasya tad abhyāsād āśrayaḥ parivartate
SA15dhkprvku:02205_1: sātmye api doṣa-bhāvaś cen mārgavan na avibhutvataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02206_0: viṣaya-grahaṇaṃ dharmo vijñānasya yathā asti saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02206_1: gṛhyate so asya janako vidyamāna-ātmanā iti ca
SA15dhkprvku:02207_0: eṣā prakṛtir asyās tan nimitta-antarataḥ skhalat
SA15dhkprvku:02208_0: prabhāsvaram idaṃ cittaṃ prakṛtyā āgantavo malāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02208_1: tat-prāg apy asamarthānāṃ paścāc śaktiḥ kva tanmaye
SA15dhkprvku:02209_0: na alaṃ praroḍhum atyantaṃ syandinyām agni-vad bhuvi
SA15dhkprvku:02210_1: na bādhā yatnavattve api buddhes tat pakṣa-pātataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02211_1: rāga-pratighayor bādhā bhede api na parasparam
SA15dhkprvku:02212_1: tan-mūlāś ca malāḥ sarve sa ca satkāyadarśanam
SA15dhkprvku:02214_0: vyākhyeyo atra virodho yas tad-virodhāc ca tanmayaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02216_1: sa ātmatvena anapāyatvād anekāntāc ca bhasma-vat
SA15dhkprvku:02217_0: yaḥ paśyaty ātmānaṃ tatra aham iti śāśvataḥ snehaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02217_1: snehāt sukheṣu tṛṣyati tṛṣṇā doṣāṃs tiraskurute
SA15dhkprvku:02218_0: guṇa-darśī paritṛṣyan mama iti tat sādhanāny upādatte
SA15dhkprvku:02218_1: tena ātma-abhiniveśo yāvat tāvat sa saṃsāre
SA15dhkprvku:02220_0: niyamena ātmani snihyaṃs tadīye na virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:02220_1: na ca asty ātmani nirdoṣe sneha-apagama-kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:02221_0: snehaḥ sadoṣa iti cet tataḥ kiṃ tasya varjanam
SA15dhkprvku:02221_1: adūṣite asya viṣaye na śakyaṃ tasya varjanam
SA15dhkprvku:02222_1: tayor adṛṣṭir viṣaye na tu bāhyeṣu yaḥ kramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02223_0: na hi sneha-guṇāt snehaḥ kiṃ tv artha-guṇa-darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:02223_1: kāraṇe avikale tasmin kāryaṃ kena nivāryate
SA15dhkprvku:02224_0: kā vā sadoṣatā dṛṣṭā snehe duḥkha-samāśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02224_1: tathā api na virāgo atra svatva-dṛṣṭer yathā ātmani
SA15dhkprvku:02225_0: na tair vinā duḥkha-hetur ātmā cet te api tādṛśāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02225_1: nirdoṣaṃ dvayam apy evaṃ vairāgyaṃ na dvayos tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02226_1: ātmīya-buddhi-hānyā atra tyāgo na tu viparyaye
SA15dhkprvku:02227_1: svatva-dhīḥ kena vāryeta vairāgyaṃ tatra tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02228_1: cyuteṣu sā ghṛṇā buddhir jāyate anyatra saspṛhā
SA15dhkprvku:02229_1: sambandhaḥ sa tathā eva iti dṛṣṭāv api na hīyate
SA15dhkprvku:02230_1: duḥkha-upakārān na bhaved aṅgulyām iva cet sva-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02231_0: na hy ekāntena tad duḥkhaṃ bhūyasā saviṣa-anna-vat
SA15dhkprvku:02233_1: yasya ātmā vallabhaḥ tasya sa nāśaṃ katham icchati
SA15dhkprvku:02234_1: icchet prema kathaṃ premṇaḥ prakṛtir na hi tādṛśī
SA15dhkprvku:02235_0: sarvathā ātma-grahaḥ sneham ātmani draḍhayaty alam
SA15dhkprvku:02236_1: vṛttimān pratibadhnāti tad doṣān saṃvṛnoti ca
SA15dhkprvku:02237_0: ātmany api virāgaś cet na idānīṃ yo virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:02237_1: tyajaty asau yathā ātmānaṃ vyarthā ato duḥkha-bhāvanā
SA15dhkprvku:02238_0: duḥkha-bhāvanayā apy eṣa duḥkham eva vibhāvayet
SA15dhkprvku:02238_1: pratyakṣaṃ pūrvam api tat tathā api na virāgavān
SA15dhkprvku:02239_0: yady apy ekatra doṣeṇa tat kṣaṇaṃ calitā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02239_1: viraktau na eva tatra api kāmi iva vanita-antare
SA15dhkprvku:02240_0: tyājya-upādeya-bhede hi saktir yā eva eka-bhāvinī
SA15dhkprvku:02241_1: etāvad eva ca jagat kva idānīṃ sa virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:02242_0: sadoṣatā api cet tatra tasya tatra ātmany api sā samā
SA15dhkprvku:02242_1: tatra aviraktas tad-doṣe kva idānīṃ sa virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:02243_1: sa ca indriya-ādau na tv evaṃ bāla-āder api darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:02244_0: doṣavaty api sadbhāvāt svabhāvād guṇavaty api
SA15dhkprvku:02245_0: tata eva ca na ātmīya-buddher api guṇa-īkṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:02245_1: kāraṇaṃ hīyate sa api tasmān na aguṇa-darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:02246_0: api ca asad guṇa-āropaḥ snehāt tatra hi dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:02246_1: tasmāt ta kāraṇā bādhī vidhis taṃ bādhate katham
SA15dhkprvku:02247_1: indriya-ādeḥ pṛthag bhūtam ātmānaṃ vetty ayaṃ janaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02248_0: tasmān na ekatva-dṛṣṭyā api snehaḥ snihyan sa ātmani
SA15dhkprvku:02249_0: pratyutpannā tu yo duḥkhān nirvedo dveṣa īdṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02249_1: na vairāgyaṃ tadā apy asya sneho avasthā-antar eṣaṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:02250_1: tasminn nivṛtte prakṛtiṃ svām eva bhajate punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02252_1: sā ca naḥ pratyaya-utpattiḥ sā nairātmya-dṛg-āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02253_1: anityāt prāha tena eva duḥkhaṃ duḥkhān nirātmatām
SA15dhkprvku:02254_1: so amuktaḥ kleśa-karmabhyāṃ saṃsārī nāma tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02255_0: ātmīyam eva yo na icched bhoktā apy asya na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:02255_1: ātmā api na tadā tasya kriyā-bhogau hi lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:02258_0: na alaṃ bīja-ādi-saṃsiddho vidhiḥ puṃsām ajanmane
SA15dhkprvku:02259_0: prāg guror lāghavāt paścān na pāpa-haraṇaṃ kṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:02259_1: mā bhūt gauravam eva asya na pāpaṃ gurv-amūrtitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02260_1: hīna-sthāna-gatir janma tena tacchin na jāyate
SA15dhkprvku:02261_0: tayor eva hi sāmarthyaṃ jātau tan-mātra-bhavataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02261_1: te cetane svayaṃ karma ity akhaṇḍaṃ janma-kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:02262_1: adṛṣṭa-nāśād agatis tat saṃskāro na cetanā
SA15dhkprvku:02263_1: dṛṣṭaṃ buddhern na ca anyasya tāni santi na santi kim
SA15dhkprvku:02264_1: na syus teṣām asāmarthye tasya dīkṣā-ādy-anantaram
SA15dhkprvku:02265_0: atha buddhes tadā abhāvān na syuḥ sandhīyate malaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02265_1: buddhes teṣām asāmarthye jīvato api syur akṣamāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02267_1: kriyāyām akriyāyāṃ ca kriyā ca sadṛśa-ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02268_0: aikyaṃ ca hetu-phalayor vyatireke tatas tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02268_1: kartṛ-bhoktṛtva-hāniḥ syāt sāmarthyaṃ ca na sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:02269_1: asmṛteḥ kasyacit tena hy anubhūteḥ smṛta-udbhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02270_0: sthiraṃ sukhaṃ mama ahaṃ ca ity ādi satya-catuṣṭaye
SA15dhkprvku:02271_1: hanti sā anucarāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ samyag-dṛṣṭiḥ subhāvitā
SA15dhkprvku:02272_0: tri-hetorn na udbhavaḥ karma-dehayoḥ sthitayor api
SA15dhkprvku:02272_1: eka-abhāvād vinā bījaṃ na aṅkurasya iva janmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02273_1: aśakyatvāc ca tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthitāyāṃ punar udbhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:02274_0: dvaya-kṣaya-arthaṃ yatne ca vyarthaḥ karma-kṣaye śramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02275_0: karmaṇāṃ tāpa-saṃkleśāt na eka-rūpāt tataḥ kṣayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:02275_1: phalaṃ kathaṃcit taj-janyam alpaṃ syān na vijātimat
SA15dhkprvku:02277_0: yadi iṣṭam aparaṃ kleśāt tat tapaḥ kleśa eva cet
SA15dhkprvku:02277_1: tat karma-phalam ity asmān na śakteḥ saṃkara-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:02278_1: tajje karmaṇi śaktāḥ syuḥ kṛta-hāniḥ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:02279_0: doṣā na karmaṇo duṣṭaḥ karoti na viparyayāt
SA15dhkprvku:02279_1: mithyā-vikalpena vinā na abhilāṣaḥ sukhād api
SA15dhkprvku:02282_0: dayayā śreya ācaṣṭe jñānāt satyaṃ sasādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:02282_1: tac ca abhiyogavān vaktuṃ yatas tasmāt pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:02284_0: prayoga-darśanād vā asya yat kiṃcid udaya-ātmakam
SA15dhkprvku:02284_1: nirodha-dharmakaṃ sarvaṃ tad ity ādāv anekadhā
SA15dhkprvku:02285_1: vyāpti-pradarśanād hetoḥ sādhyena uktaṃ ca tat sphuṭam
SA15dhkprvku:03004_0: aśaktaṃ sarvam iti ced bīja-āder aṅkura-ādiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:03004_1: dṛṣṭā śaktiḥ matā sā cet saṃvṛtyā astu yathā tathā
SA15dhkprvku:03005_0: sā asti sarvatra ced buddher na anvaya-vyatirekayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03007_1: jñeyatvena grahād doṣo na abhāveṣu prasajyate
SA15dhkprvku:03008_1: jñāna-rūpatayā arthatvāt keśa-ādi iti matiḥ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03012_1: sārūpyād bhrāntito vṛttir arthe cet syān na sarvadā
SA15dhkprvku:03013_0: deśa-bhrāntiś ca na jñāne tulyam utpattito dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03016_1: ajñātasya svayaṃ jñānān nāma-ādy etena varṇitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03017_0: sā eva iṣṭa-arthavatī kena cakṣur-ādi-matir matā
SA15dhkprvku:03018_1: atīta-anāgataṃ vācyaṃ na syād arthena tat kṣayāt
SA15dhkprvku:03019_1: tan na kevala-sāmānya-agrahaṇād grahaṇe api vā
SA15dhkprvku:03020_1: nityatvāc ca yadi vyaktir vyakteḥ pratyakṣatāṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:03021_0: ātmani jñāna-janane yac śaktaṃ śaktam eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:03021_1: atha aśaktaṃ kadācic ced aśaktaṃ sarvadā eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:03022_0: tasya śaktir aśaktir vā yā svabhāvena saṃsthitā
SA15dhkprvku:03022_1: nityatvād acikitsyasya kas tāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03023_1: nīla-ādy-ākāra-leśo yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03024_0: pratyakṣa-pratyaya-arthatvān na akṣāṇāṃ vyarthatā iti cet
SA15dhkprvku:03024_1: sā eva eka-rūpāc śabda-āder bhinna-ābhāsā matiḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03025_0: na jātir jātimad vyakti-rūpaṃ yena apara-āśrayam
SA15dhkprvku:03025_1: siddhaṃ pṛthak cet kāryatvaṃ hy apekṣā ity abhidhīyate
SA15dhkprvku:03027_0: anyatve tad asambaddhaṃ siddhā ato niḥsvabhāvatā
SA15dhkprvku:03027_1: jāti-prasaṅgo abhāvasya na apekṣā abhāvatas tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03029_0: tasyāṃ rūpa-avabhāso yas tattvena arthasya vā grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03030_1: yan niṣṭhās ta ime śabdā na rūpaṃ tasya kiṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:03031_1: artha-bhrāntir api iṣyeta sāmānyaṃ sā apy abhiplavāt
SA15dhkprvku:03032_0: artha-rūpatayā tattvena abhāvāc ca na rūpiṇī
SA15dhkprvku:03033_0: yadi vastu na vastūnām avācyatvaṃ kathaṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:03035_0: upacārāt tad iṣṭaṃ ced vartamāna-ghaṭasya kā
SA15dhkprvku:03035_1: pratyāsattir abhāvena yā paṭa-ādau na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:03036_1: siṃhe māṇavake tadvad ghoṣaṇā apy asti laukikī
SA15dhkprvku:03037_0: yatra rūḍhyā asad-artho api janaiḥ śabdo niveśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03037_1: sa mukhyas tatra tat-sāmyād gauṇo anyatra skhalad gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03038_0: yathābhāve apy abhāva-ākhyāṃ yathā-kalpanam eva vā
SA15dhkprvku:03038_1: kuryād aśakte śakte vā pradhāna-ādi-śrutiṃ janaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03039_0: śabdebhyo yādṛśī buddhir naṣṭe anaṣṭe api dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:03039_1: tādṛśy eva sad-arthānāṃ na etac śrotṛ-ādi-cetasām
SA15dhkprvku:03040_1: tasya api kevalasya prāg grahaṇaṃ vinivāritam
SA15dhkprvku:03041_1: rūpaṃ dvirūpatāyāṃ vā tad-vastv ekaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03042_0: tābhyāṃ tad-anyad eva syād yadi rūpaṃ samaṃ tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03042_1: tayor iti na sambandho vyāvṛttis tu na duṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:03043_0: tasmāt samānatā eva asmin sāmānye avastu-lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:03043_1: kāryaṃ ca tad anekaṃ syān naśvaraṃ ca tan-matam
SA15dhkprvku:03045_0: yac ca vastu-balāj jñānaṃ jāyate tad apekṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:03045_1: na saṃketaṃ na sāmānya-buddhiṣv etad vibhāvyate
SA15dhkprvku:03046_0: yā apy abheda-anugā buddhiḥ kācid vastu-dvaye kṣaṇe
SA15dhkprvku:03047_1: jñāna-kāryeṣu jātir vā yayā anveti vibhāgataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03048_1: yadi nāma indriyāṇāṃ syād draṣṭā bhāseta tad-vapuḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03049_1: vyakti-grahe ca tac śabda-rūpād anyan na dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:03050_1: tad ayogyatayā arūpaṃ tad hy avastuṣu lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:03052_1: na ukta-uttaratvād dṛṣṭatvād atīta-ādiṣu ca anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:03053_1: taj-jñānam ity adoṣo ayaṃ meyaṃ tv ekaṃ svalakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:03055_1: gatiś cet pararūpeṇa na ca bhrānteḥ pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:03056_1: gatir apy anyathā dṛṣṭā pakṣaś ca ayaṃ kṛta-uttaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03059_1: tasya svatantraṃ grahaṇam ato anyad vastv atīndriyam
SA15dhkprvku:03060_1: tad-āśrayeṇa sambandhī yadi syād gamakas tadā
SA15dhkprvku:03061_1: tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣo artho viśeṣeṇa na gamyate
SA15dhkprvku:03062_0: yā ca sambandhino dharmād gatir dharmiṇi jāyate
SA15dhkprvku:03062_1: sā anumānaṃ parokṣāṇām ekaṃ tena eva sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:03064_1: ekam eva aprameyatvād asataś cen mataṃ ca naḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03065_1: tan niścaya-pramāṇaṃ vā dvitīyaṃ na akṣajā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03067_0: abhāve vinivṛttiś cet pratyakṣasya eva niścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03067_1: viruddhaṃ sā eva vā liṅgam anvaya-vyatirekiṇī
SA15dhkprvku:03069_1: na āśvāsa iti cel liṅgaṃ durdṛṣṭer atad īdṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:03070_0: yataḥ kadācit siddhā asya pratītir vastunaḥ kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:03070_1: tad avaśyaṃ tato jātaṃ tat svabhāvo api vā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03071_0: sva-nimittaṃ svabhāvaṃ vā vinā na arthasya sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03071_1: yac ca rūpaṃ tayor dṛṣṭaṃ tad eva anyatra lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:03072_1: anyeṣu satsv adṛśye ca sattā vā tadvataḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:03074_0: tac ca na indriya-śakty-ādāv akṣa-buddher asambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:03075_1: vikalpena na sāmānya-grahas tasmiṃs tato anumā
SA15dhkprvku:03076_1: pramāṇam anyat tad buddhir vinā liṅgena sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:03077_1: tat pramāṇa-antaraṃ meya-bahutvād bahutā api vā
SA15dhkprvku:03078_0: pramāṇānām anekasya vṛtter ekatra vā yathā
SA15dhkprvku:03079_1: yojanād varṇa-sāmānye na ayaṃ doṣaḥ prasajyeta
SA15dhkprvku:03080_0: na avastu rūpaṃ tasya eva tathā siddhe prasādhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:03080_1: anyatra na anya-siddhiś cen na tasya eva prasiddhitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03081_0: yo hi bhāvo yathābhūto sa tādṛg liṅga-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03081_1: hetus tajjā tathābhūte tasmād vastuni liṅgi-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03084_1: nimittaṃ tat svabhāvo vā kāraṇaṃ tac ca tad dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03085_1: siddhiṃ pramāṇair vadatām arthād eva viparyayāt
SA15dhkprvku:03086_1: niṣedhe yā api tasya eva sā apramāṇatva-sūcanā
SA15dhkprvku:03087_0: anyathā ekasya bhāvasya sadbhāva-uktyā parasya tat
SA15dhkprvku:03087_1: na astitvaṃ kena gamyeta virodhāc ced asāv api
SA15dhkprvku:03088_0: siddhaḥ kena asahasthānād iti cet tat kuto matam
SA15dhkprvku:03088_1: dṛśyasya darśana-abhāvād iti cet sā apramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:03089_0: tasmāt sva-śabdena uktā api sā abhāvasya prasādhikā
SA15dhkprvku:03089_1: yasyā pramāṇaṃ sā avācyo niṣedhas tena sarvathā
SA15dhkprvku:03090_1: prayogaḥ kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ sarvatra artho na bhidyate
SA15dhkprvku:03091_0: viruddhaṃ tac ca sā upāyam avidhāyā api dhāya ca
SA15dhkprvku:03091_1: pramāṇa-uktir niṣedhe yā na sā nyāyānusāriṇī
SA15dhkprvku:03093_1: tādṛśo anupalabdheś ced ucyatāṃ sā eva sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:03095_0: bhinno abhinno api vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prayujyate
SA15dhkprvku:03095_1: yathā agnir ahime sādhye sattā vā janma-bādhanī
SA15dhkprvku:03096_0: yathā vastv eva vastūnāṃ sādhane sādhanaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:03096_1: tathā vastv eva vastūnāṃ sva-nivṛttau nivartakam
SA15dhkprvku:03098_0: tatra api vyāpako dharmo nivṛtter gamako mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03099_0: yad apramāṇatā abhāve liṅgaṃ tasya eva kathyate
SA15dhkprvku:03100_1: tac ca hetau svabhāve vā adṛśye dṛśyatayā mate
SA15dhkprvku:03101_0: anumānād anitya-āder grahaṇe ayaṃ kramo mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03101_1: prāmāṇyam eva na anyatra gṛhīta-grahaṇān matam
SA15dhkprvku:03102_0: na anyās yā anityatā bhāvāt pūrva-siddhaḥ sa ca indriyāt
SA15dhkprvku:03102_1: na aneka-rūpo vācyo asau vācyo dharmo vikalpajaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03103_1: tad-asiddhau tathā asya eva hy anumānaṃ pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:03108_1: buddhayo arthe pravartante abhinne bhinna-āśrayā iva
SA15dhkprvku:03109_0: yathā-codanam ākhyāś ca so asati bhrānti-kāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:03110_0: siddho atra apy athavā dhvaṃso liṅgād anupalambhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:03110_1: prāg bhūtvā hy abhavad bhāvo anitya ity abhidhīyate
SA15dhkprvku:03111_1: anityatā śrutis tena tāvantāv iti kau smṛtau
SA15dhkprvku:03112_0: prāk paścād apy abhāvaś cet sa eva anityatā na kim
SA15dhkprvku:03112_1: ṣaṣṭhy-ādy-ayogād iti ced antayoḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03113_1: aviśeṣaṇam eva syād antau cet kārya-kāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:03114_0: asambandhān na bhāvasya prāg-abhāvaṃ sa vāñchati
SA15dhkprvku:03114_1: tad-upādhi-samākhyāne te apy asya ca na sidhyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03115_1: sā sattā sa ca sambandho nityau kāryam atha iha kim
SA15dhkprvku:03116_0: yasya abhāvaḥ kriyeta asau na bhāvaḥ prāg-abhāvavān
SA15dhkprvku:03119_0: nidarśanaṃ tad eva iti sāmānya-agrahaṇaṃ yadi
SA15dhkprvku:03119_1: nidarśanatvāt siddhasya pramāṇena asya kiṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03120_0: vismṛtatvād adoṣaś cet tad eva anidarśanam
SA15dhkprvku:03122_0: sandhīyamānaṃ ca anyena vyavasāyaṃ smṛtiṃ viduḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03122_1: tal-liṅga-apekṣaṇān no cet smṛtir na vyabhicārataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03124_1: sthito api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate sā akṣajā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03125_0: punar vikalpayan kiṃcid āsīn me kalpanā īdṛśī
SA15dhkprvku:03125_1: icchā ca iti na pūrva-ukta-avasthāyām indriyād gatau
SA15dhkprvku:03126_0: ekatra dṛṣṭo bhedo hi kvacin na anyatra dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:03126_1: na tasmāt bhinnam asty anyat sāmānyaṃ buddhy-abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03127_0: tasmād viśeṣa-viṣayā sarvā eva indriyajā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03128_1: viṣayo yaś ca śabdānāṃ saṃyojyeta sa eva taiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03129_0: asya idam iti sambandhe yāv arthau pratibhāsinau
SA15dhkprvku:03129_1: tayor eva hi sambandho na tadā indriya-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03131_0: cakṣuṣo artha-avabhāse api yaṃ paro asya iti śaṃsati
SA15dhkprvku:03131_1: sa eva yojyate śabdairn na khalv indriya-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03133_1: vimūḍho laghuvṛtter vā tayor aikyaṃ vyayasyati
SA15dhkprvku:03134_1: iti ced bhinna-jātīya-vikalpe anyasya vā katham
SA15dhkprvku:03135_1: anyatra api samānaṃ tad varṇayor vā sakṛc śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03136_0: sakṛt saṃgata-sarva-artheṣv indriyeṣv iha satsv api
SA15dhkprvku:03136_1: pañcabhir vyavadhāne api bhāty avyavahita iva yā
SA15dhkprvku:03137_1: vicchinna-ābhā iti tac citraṃ tasmāt santu sakṛd dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03138_1: śuddhe mano-vikalpe ca na krama-grahaṇam bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03139_0: yo agrahaḥ saṃgate apy arthe kvacid āsakta-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03139_1: saktyā anya-utpatti-vaiguṇyāc codyaṃ vā etad dvayor api
SA15dhkprvku:03140_1: cakra-bhrāntiṃ dṛśā dhatte na dṛśāṃ ghaṭanena sā
SA15dhkprvku:03141_1: āhur bālā vikalpe ca hetuṃ saṃketa-mandatām
SA15dhkprvku:03142_0: teṣāṃ pratyakṣam eva syād bālānām avikalpanāt
SA15dhkprvku:03142_1: saṃketa-upāya-vigamāt paścād api bhaven na saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03143_0: mano avyutpanna-saṃketam asti tena sa cen mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03143_1: evam indriyaje api syād śeṣavac ca idam īdṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:03144_0: yad eva sādhanaṃ bāle tad eva atra api kathyatām
SA15dhkprvku:03145_0: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca sambandhaṃ laukikīṃ sthitim
SA15dhkprvku:03145_1: gṛhītvā saṃkalayya etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:03146_1: tadvatā yojanā na asti kalpanā apy atra na asty ataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03147_0: yady apy anvayi vijñānaṃ śabda-vyakty-avabhāsi tat
SA15dhkprvku:03148_0: samānatve api tasya eva na īkṣaṇaṃ netra-gocaram
SA15dhkprvku:03149_1: paṭas tantuṣv iha ity ādi-śabdāś ca ime svayaṃ kṛtāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03150_0: śṛṅgaṅ gavi iti loke syāc śṛṅge gaur ity alaukikam
SA15dhkprvku:03151_0: tais tantubhir iyaṃ śāṭi ity uttaraṃ kāryam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:03152_1: tantv-ākhyāṃ vartayet kārye darśayan na āśrayaṃ śruteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03154_0: anumānaṃ ca jāty-ādau vastuno na asti bhedini
SA15dhkprvku:03154_1: sarvatra vyapadeśo hi daṇḍa-āder api sāṃvṛtāt
SA15dhkprvku:03155_1: geho yady api saṃyogas tan mālā kiṃ nu tad bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03156_0: jātiś ced geha eko api mālā ity ucyeta vṛkṣa-vat
SA15dhkprvku:03156_1: mālā-bahutve tac śabdaḥ kathaṃ jāter ajātitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03157_0: mālā-ādau ca mahattva-ādir iṣṭo yaś ca aupacārikaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03158_1: padārtha-śabdaḥ kaṃ hetum anyaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ samīkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:03159_0: yo yathā rūḍhitaḥ siddhas tat-sāmya-ādyas tathā ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:03159_1: mukhyo gauṇaś ca bhāveṣv apy abhāvasya upacārataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03160_0: saṃketa-anvayinī rūḍhir vaktur icchā anvayī ca saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03161_1: bhede api yatra taj-jñānāt tat tathā pratipadyate
SA15dhkprvku:03162_1: ity etat kārya-viśleṣasya anvayo na eka-vastunaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03163_0: vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tan niṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03165_0: vyatirekī iva yaj jñāne bhāty artha-pratibimbakam
SA15dhkprvku:03165_1: śabdāt tad api na artha-ātmā bhrāntiḥ sā vāsanā-udbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:03166_0: tasya abhidhāne śrutibhir arthe ko aṃśo avagamyate
SA15dhkprvku:03166_1: tasya agatau ca saṃketa-kriyā vyarthā tad arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:03167_0: śabdo artha-aṃśakam āha iti tatra anyāpoha ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:03167_1: ākāraḥ sa ca na arthe asti tam vadann artha-bhāk katham
SA15dhkprvku:03168_0: śabdasya anvayinaḥ kāryam arthena anvayinā sa ca
SA15dhkprvku:03169_1: śabda-artho arthaḥ sa eva iti vacanena virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:03170_1: anuyānti imam artha-aṃśam iti vā apoha-kṛc śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03172_1: śrutau sambadhyate apoho na etad vastuni yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:03173_0: tasmāj jāty-ādi-tad-yogā na arthe teṣu ca na śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03175_0: anyatra gata-citto api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:03175_1: tat saṃketa-agrahas tatra spaṣṭas tajjā ca kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:03176_0: jāyante kalpanās tatra yatra śabdo niveśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03176_1: tena icchātaḥ pravarteran na īkṣeran bāhyam akṣajāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03177_0: rūpaṃ rūpam iti īkṣeta tad dhiyaṃ kim iti īkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:03177_1: asti ca anubhavas tasyāḥ so avikalpaḥ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03178_0: tasya eva anubhave dṛṣṭaṃ na vikalpa-dvayaṃ sakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:03179_0: smṛtir bhaved atīte ca sā agṛhīte kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03180_1: siddhaṃ tat kena tasmin hi na pratyakṣaṃ na laiṅgikam
SA15dhkprvku:03181_1: rūpa-ādir iva gṛhyeta na syāt tat pūrva-dhī-grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03183_0: sāmānya-vācinaḥ śabdās tad eka-arthā ca kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:03184_0: asti cen nirvikalpaṃ ca kiṃcit tat-tulya-hetukam
SA15dhkprvku:03184_1: sarvan tathā eva hetor hi bhedād bhedaḥ phala-ātmanām
SA15dhkprvku:03185_1: tathā anapekṣya samayaṃ vastu-śaktyā eva netra-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03186_1: anapekṣya na cec śakyaṃ syāt smṛtāv eva liṅga-vat
SA15dhkprvku:03187_0: tasyās tat-saṃgama-utpatter akṣa-dhīḥ syāt smṛter na vā
SA15dhkprvku:03187_1: tataḥ kāla-antare api syāt kvacid vyākṣepa-sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:03188_0: krameṇa ubhaya-hetuś cet prāg eva syād abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03188_1: anyo akṣa-buddhi-hetuś cet smṛtis tatra apy anarthikā
SA15dhkprvku:03189_1: bhedaś ca asamito grāhyaḥ smṛtis tatra kim arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:03190_1: tasmāc cakṣuś ca rūpāṃ ca pratītya udeti netra-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03191_0: sākṣāc cet jñāna-janane samartho viṣayo akṣa-vat
SA15dhkprvku:03191_1: atha kasmād dvaya-adhīna-janma tat tena na ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:03192_0: samīkṣya gamakatvaṃ hi vyapadeśo na gṛhyate
SA15dhkprvku:03192_1: tac ca akṣa-vyapadeśe asti tad-dharmaś ca niyojyatām
SA15dhkprvku:03194_0: saṃcitaḥ samudāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ tatra ca akṣa-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03195_1: uktās te saṃcitās te hi nimittāṃ jñāna-janmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03196_0: aṇūnāṃ sa viśeṣaś ca na antareṇa aparān aṇūn
SA15dhkprvku:03197_0: atha eka-āyatanatve api na anekaṃ dṛśyate sakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:03198_0: pratyuktaṃ lāghavaṃ ca atra teṣv eva krama-pātiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:03198_1: kim na akrama-grahas tulya-kālāḥ sarvāś ca buddhayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03199_0: kāścit tāsv akrama-ābhāsāḥ kramavatyo aparāś ca kim
SA15dhkprvku:03200_0: na ekaṃ citra-pataṃga-ādi rūpaṃ vā dṛśyate katham
SA15dhkprvku:03200_1: citraṃ tad ekam iti ced idaṃ citrataraṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03201_0: na ekaṃ svabhāvaṃ citraṃ hi maṇi-rūpaṃ yathā eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:03202_0: tatra avayava-rūpaṃ cet kevalaṃ dṛśyate tathā
SA15dhkprvku:03202_1: nīla-ādīni nirasya anyac citraṃ citraṃ yad īkṣase
SA15dhkprvku:03203_1: nānā-arthā kramavatyā ekā kim eka-arthā akramā aparā
SA15dhkprvku:03204_1: tac ced anaṅgaṃ kena iyaṃ siddhā bheda-vyavasthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03205_1: arūpatvān na saṃyogaś citro bhakteś ca na āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03207_0: nānā-arthā ekā bhavet tasmāt siddhānto apy avikalpikā
SA15dhkprvku:03207_1: vikalpayann apy eka-arthaṃ yato anyad api paśyati
SA15dhkprvku:03208_0: citra-avabhāseṣv artheṣu yady ekatvaṃ na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:03208_1: sā eva tāvat kathaṃ buddhir ekā citra-avabhāsinī
SA15dhkprvku:03209_1: yathā yathārthāś cintyante viśīryante tathā tathā
SA15dhkprvku:03210_0: kiṃ syāt sā citratā ekasyāṃ na syāt tasyāṃ matāv api
SA15dhkprvku:03210_1: yadi idaṃ svayam arthānāṃ rocate tatra ke vayaṃ
SA15dhkprvku:03211_0: tasmān na artheṣu na jñāne sthūla-bhāsas tadātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03211_1: ekatra pratiṣiddhatvād bahuṣv api na sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03212_0: paricchedo antar anyo ayaṃ bhāgo bahir iva sthitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03213_0: tatra ekasya apy abhāvena dvayam apy avahīyate
SA15dhkprvku:03213_1: tasmāt tad eva tasya api tattvaṃ yā dvaya-śūnyatā
SA15dhkprvku:03214_1: tad-upaplava-bhāve ca teṣāṃ bhedo apy upaplavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03216_1: lakṣaṇaṃ sa ca tattvaṃ na tena apy ete vilakṣaṇāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03220_1: aśakya-darśanas taṃ hi pataty arthe vivecayan
SA15dhkprvku:03221_0: yad yathā bhāsate jñānaṃ tat tathā eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:03221_1: iti nāma eka-bhāvaḥ syāc citra-ākārasya cetasi
SA15dhkprvku:03222_1: vivekī na vivakṣā anyad avivekī ca na īkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:03223_0: ko vā virodho bahavaḥ saṃjāta-atiśayāḥ pṛthak
SA15dhkprvku:03223_1: bhaveyuḥ kāraṇaṃ buddher yadi na ātma-indriya-ādi-vat
SA15dhkprvku:03224_0: hetu-bhāvād ṛte na anyā grāhyatā nāma kācana
SA15dhkprvku:03224_1: tatra buddhir yad ābhāsā tasyās tad-grāhyam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:03225_0: kathaṃ vā avayavī grāhyaḥ sakṛt sva-avayavaiḥ saha
SA15dhkprvku:03225_1: na hi go-pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ sāsnā-ādīnām adarśane
SA15dhkprvku:03226_1: sampūrṇa-aṅgo na gṛhyeta sakṛn na api guṇa-ādimān
SA15dhkprvku:03227_1: yad aṅga-bhāvena upāttan tat tena eva hi gṛhyate
SA15dhkprvku:03228_1: agrahād bheda-buddhiḥ syāt paśyato apy aparāparam
SA15dhkprvku:03229_1: astu nāma tathā apy eṣāṃ bhavet sambandhi-saṃkaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03233_0: yady apy asti sitatva-ādir yādṛg indriya-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03233_1: na so abhidhīyate śabdair jñānayo rūpa-bhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03234_0: eka-arthatve api buddhīnāṃ nānā-āśrayatā sa cet
SA15dhkprvku:03234_1: śrotṛ-ādi-cittāni idānīṃ bhinna-arthāni iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03235_0: jāto nāma āśrayo anyonyaḥ cetasāṃ tasya vastunaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03235_1: ekasya eva kuto rūpaṃ bhinna-ākāra-avabhāsi tat
SA15dhkprvku:03237_1: dṛśye gava-ādau jāty-ādes tad apy etena dūṣitam
SA15dhkprvku:03238_0: darśanāny eva bhinnāny apy ekāṃ kurvanti kalpanām
SA15dhkprvku:03240_0: kṣaṇikatvād atītasya darśane ca na sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03241_1: karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanaṃ kim iti iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:03242_0: sakṛd bhāvaś ca sarvāsāṃ dhiyāṃ tadbhāva-janmanām
SA15dhkprvku:03243_1: mano anyam eva gṛhṇāti viṣayaṃ na andhadṛk tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03244_1: tato anya-grahaṇe apy asya niyata-grāhyatā matā
SA15dhkprvku:03245_1: sahakāri bhaved artha iti ced akṣa-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03246_0: asataḥ prāg asāmarthyāt paścāc ca anupayogataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03246_1: prāgbhāvaḥ sarva-hetūnāṃ na ato arthaḥ sva-dhiyā saha
SA15dhkprvku:03247_0: bhinna-kālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyam iti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03248_0: kāryaṃ hy aneka-hetutve apy anukurvad udeti yat
SA15dhkprvku:03248_1: tat tena arpita-tad-rūpaṃ gṛhītam iti ca ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:03250_0: avedakāḥ parasya api te svarūpaṃ kathaṃ viduḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03252_0: sā arthe sati indriye yogye yathāsvam api cetasi
SA15dhkprvku:03252_1: dṛṣṭaṃ janma sukha-ādīnāṃ tat-tulyaṃ manasām api
SA15dhkprvku:03253_0: asatsu satsu ca eteṣu na janma-ajanma vā kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:03253_1: dṛṣṭaṃ sukha-āder buddher vā ta tato na anyataś ca te
SA15dhkprvku:03255_0: yasya arthasya nipātena te jātā dhī-sukha-ādayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03255_1: taṃ muktvā pratipadyeta sukha-ādīn eva sā katham
SA15dhkprvku:03256_1: tal-lāghavāc cet tat-tulyam ity asaṃvedanaṃ na kim
SA15dhkprvku:03257_0: na ca ekayā dvaya-jñānaṃ niyamād akṣa-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03257_1: sukha-ādy-abhāve apy arthāc ca jāteḥ tac śakty-asiddhitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03258_0: pṛthak pṛthak ca sāmarthye dvayor nīla-ādi-vat sukham
SA15dhkprvku:03259_0: na hi saṃvedanaṃ yuktam arthena eva saha-grahe
SA15dhkprvku:03259_1: kiṃ sāmarthyaṃ sukha-ādīnāṃ na iṣṭā dhīr yat tad udbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:03260_1: rūpa-ādiḥ stry-ādi-bhedo akṣaṇā na gṛhyeta kadācana
SA15dhkprvku:03261_0: na hi saty antaraṅge arthe śakter dhīr bāhya-darśanī
SA15dhkprvku:03263_0: saty āntare apy upādāne jñāne duḥkha-ādi-sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03263_1: na upādānaṃ viruddhasya tac ca ekam iti cen matam
SA15dhkprvku:03264_1: ādhipatyaṃ tu kurvīta tad-viruddhe api dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:03266_1: vedakāḥ svātmanaś ca eṣām arthebhyo janma kevalam
SA15dhkprvku:03267_0: artha-ātmā svātmabhūto hi teṣāṃ tair anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:03268_0: kaścid bahiḥ sthitān eva sukha-ādīn apracetanān
SA15dhkprvku:03268_1: grāhyān āha na tasya api sakṛd yukto dvaya-grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03269_1: bhinna-avabhāsinor grāhyaṃ cetasos tad abhedi kim
SA15dhkprvku:03270_1: tāratamyaṃ ca buddhau syān na prīti-paritāpayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03271_1: sa idānīṃ kathaṃ bāhyaḥ sukha-ādy-ātmā iti gamyate
SA15dhkprvku:03272_1: agrāhakaḥ syāt sarvasya tato hīyeta bhoktṛtā
SA15dhkprvku:03273_1: grāhyagrāhakatā-abhāvād bhāve anyatra api sā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03274_0: tasmāt ta āntarā eva saṃvedyatvāc ca cetanāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03274_1: saṃvedanaṃ na yad rūpaṃ na hi tat tasya vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:03275_0: atat-svabhāvo anubhavo bauddhāṃs tān samavaiti cet
SA15dhkprvku:03275_1: muktvā adhyakṣa-smṛta-ākārāṃ saṃvittiṃ buddhir atra kā
SA15dhkprvku:03276_1: ekam āvirbhavad dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tv anyad antarā
SA15dhkprvku:03278_0: abhinna-vedanasya aikye yan na evaṃ tad-vibheda-vat
SA15dhkprvku:03278_1: sidhyed asādhanatve asya na siddhaṃ bheda-sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:03279_1: abhinna-ābhe vibhinne ced bheda-abhedau kim āśrayau
SA15dhkprvku:03281_0: prāguktaṃ yogināṃ jñānaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhāvanām ayam
SA15dhkprvku:03282_1: abhūtān api paśyanti purato avasthitān iva
SA15dhkprvku:03283_1: svapne api smaryate smārtaṃ ca tat tādṛg arthavat
SA15dhkprvku:03285_0: tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā yad yad eva abhibhāvyate
SA15dhkprvku:03286_0: tatra pramāṇaṃ saṃvādi yat prāṅ nirṇīta-vastu-vat
SA15dhkprvku:03287_0: śabda-artha-grāhi yad yatra taj-jñānaṃ tatra kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:03287_1: svarūpaṃ ca na śabda-arthas tatra adhyakṣam ato akhilam
SA15dhkprvku:03292_1: na pratyayo anuyaṃs tac ca pratyakṣāt parihīyate
SA15dhkprvku:03293_0: apavādaś caturtho atra tena uktam upaghātajam
SA15dhkprvku:03294_0: mānasaṃ tad api ity eke teṣāṃ grantho virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:03294_1: nīla-dvi-candra-ādi-dhiyāṃ hetur akṣāṇy api ity ayam
SA15dhkprvku:03296_0: kiṃ vā aindriyaṃ yad akṣāṇāṃ bhāva-abhāva-anurodhi cet
SA15dhkprvku:03296_1: tat-tulyaṃ vikriyā-vac cet sā iva iyaṃ kiṃ niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:03297_0: sarpa-ādi-bhrānti-vac ca asyāḥ syād akṣa-vikṛtāv api
SA15dhkprvku:03297_1: nivṛttir na nivarteta nivṛtte apy akṣa-viplave
SA15dhkprvku:03298_0: kadācid anya-santāne tathā eva apy eta vācakaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03299_0: suptasya jāgrato vā api yā eva dhīḥ sphuṭa-bhāsinī
SA15dhkprvku:03299_1: sā nirvikalpa-ubhayathā apy anyathā eva vikalpikā
SA15dhkprvku:03300_0: tasmāt tasya avikalpe api prāmāṇyaṃ pratiṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:03300_1: visaṃvādāt tad-arthaṃ ca pratyakṣa-ābhaṃ dvidhā uditam
SA15dhkprvku:03301_0: kriyā-sādhanam ity eva sarvaṃ sarvasya karmaṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03301_1: sādhanaṃ na hi tat tasyāḥ sādhanaṃ yā kriyā yataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03302_1: bhāvyaṃ tena ātmanā yena pratikarma vibhajyate
SA15dhkprvku:03303_0: anātmabhūto bhedo asya vidyamāno api hetuṣu
SA15dhkprvku:03303_1: bhinne karmaṇy abhinnasya na bhedena niyāmakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03304_0: tasmād yato asya ātma-bhedo asya adhigatir ity ayam
SA15dhkprvku:03305_0: arthena ghaṭayaty enāṃ na hi muktvā artha-rūpatām
SA15dhkprvku:03305_1: anyaḥ sva-bhedāj jñānasya bhedako api kathaṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:03307_0: sā ca tasya ātmabhūtā eva tena na artha-antaraṃ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:03307_1: dadhānaṃ tac ca tām ātmany artha-adhigamana-ātmanā
SA15dhkprvku:03310_1: na iṣṭaṃ prāmāṇyam eteṣāṃ vyavadhānāt kriyāṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:03311_0: sarveṣām upayoge api kārakāṇāṃ kriyāṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:03311_1: yad antyaṃ bhedakaṃ tasyās tat-sādhakatamaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:03312_1: tad-bhede api hy abhinnasya tasya idam iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03313_1: atādrūpye na bhedo api tadvad anya-dhiyo api vā
SA15dhkprvku:03314_0: na iṣṭo viṣaya-bhedo api kriyā-sādhanayor dvayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03314_1: eka-arthatve dvayaṃ vyarthaṃ na ca syāt krama-bhāvitā
SA15dhkprvku:03316_0: sarva-ātmanā api sambaddhaṃ kaiścid eva avagamyate
SA15dhkprvku:03316_1: dharmaiḥ sa niyamo na syāt sambandhasya aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03317_0: tad abhede api bhedo ayaṃ yasmāt tasya pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:03317_1: saṃskārāc ced atādrūpye na tasya apy avyavasthiteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03320_0: kā artha saṃvid yad eva idaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prativedanam
SA15dhkprvku:03321_0: atha so anubhavaḥ kva asya tad eva idaṃ vicāryate
SA15dhkprvku:03321_1: sarūpavanti tat kena sthūla-ābhāsaś ca te aṇavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03324_0: idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vedam iti yatra avasāya-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03324_1: sa tasya anubhavaḥ sā eva pratyāsattir vicāryate
SA15dhkprvku:03325_1: tayoḥ sambandham āśritya draṣṭur eṣa viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03326_0: ātmā sa tasya anubhavaḥ sa ca na anyasya kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:03327_0: na anyo anubhāvyas tena asti tasya na anubhavo paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03327_1: tasya api tulya-codyatvāt svayaṃ sā eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:03328_0: nīla-ādi-rūpas tasya asau svabhāvo anubhavaś ca saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03329_1: yathā prakāśo abhimatas tathā dhīr ātma-vedinī
SA15dhkprvku:03330_0: tasyāś ca artha-antare vedye durghaṭau vedya-vedakau
SA15dhkprvku:03332_1: tadā anya-saṃvido abhāvāt svasaṃvit phalam iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:03333_0: yadi bāhyo anubhūyeta ko doṣo na eva kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:03333_1: idam eva kim uktaṃ syāt sa bāhyo artho anubhūyeta
SA15dhkprvku:03334_0: yadi buddhis tad-ākārā sā asty ākāra-niveśinī
SA15dhkprvku:03334_1: sā bāhyād anyato vā iti vicāram idam arhati
SA15dhkprvku:03335_1: darśanaṃ nīla-nirbhāsaṃ na artho bāhyo asti kevalaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03337_0: tasmād dvi-rūpam asty ekaṃ yad evam anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:03337_1: smaryate ca ubhaya-ākārasya asya saṃvedanaṃ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:03338_0: yadā niṣpanna-tadbhāva iṣṭo aniṣṭo api vā paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03338_1: vijñapti-hetur viṣayas tasyāś ca anubhavas tathā
SA15dhkprvku:03339_1: tadā ya ātma-anubhavaḥ sa eva artha-viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03340_0: yadi iṣṭa-ākāra ātmā syād anyathā vā anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:03340_1: iṣṭo aniṣṭo api vā tena bhavaty arthaḥ praveditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03341_0: vidyamāne api bāhya-arthe yathānubhavam eva saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03342_0: yadi bāhyaṃ na vidyeta kasya saṃvedanaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03342_1: yady agatyā svarūpasya bāhyasya eva na kiṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:03343_0: abhyupāye api bhedena na syād anubhavo dvayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03343_1: adṛṣṭa-āvaraṇān no cen na nāma-artha-vaśā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03344_1: tad adṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ nāma bhaved arthasya vedakam
SA15dhkprvku:03345_1: aniṣṭa-ādāv asandhānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatra api cetasām
SA15dhkprvku:03346_0: tasmāt prameye bāhye api yuktaṃ sva-anubhavaḥ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:03346_1: yataḥ svabhāvo asya yathā tathā eva artha-viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03347_0: tadā artha-ābhāsatā eva asya pramāṇaṃ na tu sann api
SA15dhkprvku:03348_0: yasmād yathā niviṣṭo asāv artha-ātmā pratyaye tathā
SA15dhkprvku:03348_1: niścīyate niviṣṭo asāv evam ity ātma-saṃvidaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03349_0: ity artha-saṃvit sā eva iṣṭā yato artha-ātmā na dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:03349_1: tasyā buddhi-niveśya-arthaḥ sādhanaṃ tasya sā kriyā
SA15dhkprvku:03350_0: yathā niviśate so arthaḥ tathā hi sa prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:03350_1: artha-sthites tadātmatvāt svavid apy arthavin matā
SA15dhkprvku:03351_0: tasmād viṣaya-bhedo api na svasaṃvedanaṃ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:03352_0: tathā avabhāsamānasya tādṛśo anya-adṛśo api vā
SA15dhkprvku:03352_1: jñānasya hetur artho api ity arthasya iṣṭā prameyatā
SA15dhkprvku:03353_0: yathā kathaṃcin na asya artha-rūpaṃ yuktyā avabhāsinaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03356_1: dūre yathā vā maruṣu mahān alpo api dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:03358_1: satyaṃ kathaṃ syur ākārās tad ekatvasya hānitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03359_0: anyasya anyatva-hāneś ca na abhedo arūpa-darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:03359_1: rūpa-abhedaṃ hi paśyantī dhīr abhedaṃ vyavasyati
SA15dhkprvku:03360_0: bhāvā yena nirūpyante tad-rūpaṃ na asti tattvataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03360_1: yasmād ekam anekaṃ vā rūpaṃ teṣāṃ na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:03362_0: adarśanāj jagat yasminn ekasya api tadātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03362_1: asti iyam api yā tv antar upaplava-samudbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:03364_1: tādātmyād ātmavit tasya sa tasyā sādhanaṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03366_0: tatra apy anubhava-ātmatvāt te yogyāḥ svātmasaṃvidi
SA15dhkprvku:03366_1: iti sā yogyatā mānam ātmā meyaḥ phalaṃ svavit
SA15dhkprvku:03367_1: sā yogyatā iti ca proktaṃ pramāṇaṃ svātmavedanam
SA15dhkprvku:03368_0: sarvam eva hi vijñānaṃ viṣayebhyaḥ samudbhavat
SA15dhkprvku:03368_1: tad-anyasya api hetutve kathaṃ syād viṣaya-ākṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03369_1: pitros tad ekasya ākāraṃ dhatte na anyasya kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:03370_1: viṣayatvaṃ tad-aṅgena tad-abhāve na tad bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03372_1: sā vā anityā na jātiḥ syān nityā vā janikā katham
SA15dhkprvku:03373_0: nāma-ādikaṃ niṣiddhaṃ prāṅ na ayam arthavatāṃ kramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03374_0: smṛtiś ca īdṛgvidhaṃ jñānaṃ tasyāś ca anubhavād bhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03374_1: sa ca artha-ākāra-rahitaḥ sā idānīṃ tadvatī katham
SA15dhkprvku:03375_0: na arthād bhāvas tadā abhāvāt syāt tathā anubhave api saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03375_1: ākāraḥ sa ca na arthasya spaṣṭa-ākāra-vivekataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03376_0: vyatiriktaṃ tam ākāraṃ pratīyād aparas tathā
SA15dhkprvku:03376_1: nityam ātmani sambandhe pratīyāt kathitaṃ ca na
SA15dhkprvku:03377_0: ekā ekena abhisambandhe pratisandhir na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:03378_1: bhinna-ātma-arthaḥ kathaṃ grāhyas tadā syād dhīr anarthikā
SA15dhkprvku:03380_0: anyathā hy atad-ākāraṃ kathaṃ jñāne adhirohati
SA15dhkprvku:03380_1: eka-ākāra-uttaraṃ jñānaṃ tathā hy uttaram uttaram
SA15dhkprvku:03381_0: tasya artha-rūpeṇa ākārāv ātma-ākāraś ca kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:03382_1: bhrāntyā saṅkalanaṃ jyotir manaskāre ca sā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03383_0: sarveṣām api kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaiḥ syāt tathā grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03384_1: sārūpyāt tat kim anyat syād dṛṣṭeś ca yamala-ādiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:03387_0: anyathā hy ādyam eva ekaṃ saṃyojyeta artha-sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:03388_1: viṣayasya tato anyatvaṃ kena ākāreṇa sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:03389_0: bhedaś ca bhrānti-vijñānair dṛśyeta indāv iva advaye
SA15dhkprvku:03390_0: na artho asaṃvedanaḥ kaścid anarthasya api vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:03390_1: dṛṣṭaṃ saṃvedyamānaṃ tat tayor na asti vivekitā
SA15dhkprvku:03392_0: abhāvād akṣa-buddhīnāṃ satsv apy anyeṣu hetuṣu
SA15dhkprvku:03392_1: niyamaṃ yadi na brūyāt pratyayāt samanantarāt
SA15dhkprvku:03394_1: buddhir āśritya kalpyeta yadi kiṃ vā virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:03395_0: anagni-janyo dhūmaḥ syāt tat-kāryāt kāraṇe agatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03395_1: na syāt kāraṇatāyāṃ vā kuta ekāntato gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03396_1: gamayed agni-nirbhāsāṃ dhiyam eva na pāvakam
SA15dhkprvku:03397_1: vyanakti citta-santāno dhiyaṃ dhūmo agnitas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03398_0: asty eṣa viduṣāṃ vādo bāhyaṃ tv āśritya varṇyate
SA15dhkprvku:03400_1: sarvaṃ tad-artham arthāc cet tasya na asti tad-ābhatā
SA15dhkprvku:03401_1: tasya kenacid aṃśena parato api bhidā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03402_0: tathā hy āśritya pitaraṃ tad-rūpo api sutaḥ pituḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03404_1: bhūtaṃ paśyaṃś ca tad-darśī kathaṃ ca upahata-indriyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03405_0: śodhitaṃ timireṇa asya vyaktaṃ cakṣur atīndriyam
SA15dhkprvku:03405_1: paśyato anya-akṣa-dṛśye arthe tad-avyaktaṃ kathaṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03406_1: śaktir hetus tato na anyo ahetuś ca viṣayaḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:03407_0: sa eva yadi dhī-hetuḥ kiṃ pradīpam apekṣate
SA15dhkprvku:03407_1: dīpa-mātreṇa sadbhāvād ubhayaṃ na api kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:03408_1: tat syād āloka-bhedāc cet tat pidhāna-apidhānayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03409_0: tulyā dṛṣṭir adṛṣṭir vā sūkṣmo aṃśas tasya kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:03409_1: ālokena na mandena dṛśyate ato bhidā yadi
SA15dhkprvku:03411_1: bhinne anyasminn abhinnasya kuto bhedena bhāsanam
SA15dhkprvku:03412_0: mandaṃ tad api tejaḥ kim āvṛtter iha sā na kim
SA15dhkprvku:03412_1: tanutvāt tejaso apy etad asty anyatra apy atānavam
SA15dhkprvku:03413_0: atyāsanne ca suvyaktaṃ tejas tat syād atisphuṭam
SA15dhkprvku:03413_1: tatra apy adṛṣṭam āśritya bhaved rūpa-antaraṃ yadi
SA15dhkprvku:03414_0: anyonya-āvaraṇāt teṣāṃ syāt tejo vihatis tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03414_1: tatra ekam eva dṛśyeta tasya anāvaraṇe sakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:03415_0: paśyet sphuṭa-asphuṭaṃ rūpam eko adṛṣṭena vāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:03415_1: artha-anarthau na yena stas tad-adṛṣṭaṃ karoti kim
SA15dhkprvku:03418_0: vyaktiḥ kuto asatāṃ jñānād anyasya anupakāriṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03418_1: vyaktau vyajyeta sarvo arthas tad-hetor niyamo yadi
SA15dhkprvku:03419_0: na eṣā api kalpanā jñāne jñānaṃ tv artha-avabhāsataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03419_1: taṃ vyanakti iti kathyeta tad-abhāve api tat-kṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:03420_0: na ākārayati ca anyo artho anupakārāt saha-uditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03420_1: vyakto na ākārayan jñānaṃ sva-ākāreṇa kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03421_0: vajra-upala-ādir apy arthaḥ sthiraḥ so anya-anapekṣaṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:03421_1: sakṛt sarvasya janayej jñānāni jagataḥ samam
SA15dhkprvku:03422_1: āhuḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedaṃ sa doṣo atra api pūrvavat
SA15dhkprvku:03423_0: saṃvedanasya tādātmye na vivādo asti kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:03423_1: tasya artha-rūpatā siddhā sā api sidhyati saṃsmṛteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03424_1: evam etan na khalv evam iti sā syān na bhedinī
SA15dhkprvku:03425_0: na ca anubhava-mātreṇa kaścid bhedo vivecakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03425_1: vivekinī na ca aspaṣṭa-bhede dhīr yamala-ādi-vat
SA15dhkprvku:03427_0: dhiyā atadrūpayā jñāne niruddhe anubhavaḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03427_1: svaṃ ca rūpaṃ na sā vetti ity utsanno anubhavo arthinaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03428_0: bahir mukhaṃ ca taj-jñānaṃ bhāty artha-pratibhāsa-vat
SA15dhkprvku:03428_1: buddheś ca grāhikā buddhir nityam antarmukhā-ātmani
SA15dhkprvku:03429_0: yo yasya viṣaya-ābhāsas taṃ vetti na tad ity api
SA15dhkprvku:03429_1: prāptā kā saṃvid anyā asti tādrūpyād iti cen matam
SA15dhkprvku:03430_1: buddhiḥ sarūpā tad-vic cet na idānīṃ vit-sarūpikā
SA15dhkprvku:03431_0: svayaṃ so anubhavas tasyā na sa sārūpya-kāraṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03433_0: dhiyo nīla-ādi-rūpatve bāhyo arthaḥ kiṃ pramāṇakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03433_1: dhiyo anīla-ādi-rūpatve sa tasya anubhavaḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:03434_1: siddhaṃ tat svata eva asya kim arthena upanīyate
SA15dhkprvku:03435_0: sarvātmanā hi sārūpye jñānam ajñānatāṃ vrajet
SA15dhkprvku:03435_1: sāmye kenacid aṅgena syāt sarvaṃ sarva-vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:03436_1: tathā anubhava-rūpatvāt tasya apy anubhavo bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03437_0: na anubhūto anubhava ity artha-vat tad-viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03437_1: tasmād adoṣa iti cet na arthe apy asty eṣa sarvadā
SA15dhkprvku:03438_0: kasmād vā anubhave na asti sati sattā-nibandhane
SA15dhkprvku:03438_1: api ca idaṃ yad ābhāti dṛśyamāne sita-ādike
SA15dhkprvku:03439_1: tat kiṃ sita-ādy-abhivyakteḥ pararūpam atha ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03440_0: pararūpe aprakāśāyāṃ vyaktau vyaktaṃ kathaṃ sitam
SA15dhkprvku:03440_1: jñānaṃ vyaktir na sā vyaktā ity avyaktam akhilaṃ jagat
SA15dhkprvku:03441_1: dṛṣṭyā ca ajñāta-sambandhaṃ viśinaṣṭi tayā katham
SA15dhkprvku:03442_0: yasmād dvayor eka-gatau na dvitīyasya darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:03442_1: dvayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayor dṛṣṭau syād dṛṣṭam iti niścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03443_0: sarūpaṃ darśanaṃ yasya dṛśyate anyena cetasā
SA15dhkprvku:03443_1: dṛṣṭa-ākhyā tatra cet siddhaṃ sārūpye asya svavedanam
SA15dhkprvku:03444_0: atha ātma-rūpan no vetti pararūpasya vit katham
SA15dhkprvku:03444_1: sārūpyād vedanā-ākhyā ca prāg eva pratipāditā
SA15dhkprvku:03445_0: dṛṣṭayor eva sārūpya-graho arthaṃ ca na dṛṣṭavān
SA15dhkprvku:03445_1: prāk kathaṃ darśanena asya sārūpyaṃ so adhyavasyati
SA15dhkprvku:03446_0: sārūpyam api na icched yaḥ tasya na ubhaya-darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:03446_1: tadā artho jñānam iti ca jñāte ca iti gatā kathā
SA15dhkprvku:03447_0: atha svarūpaṃ sā tarhi svayam eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:03447_1: yat tasyām aprakāśāyām arthaḥ syād aprakāśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03448_1: apratyakṣāṃ dhiyaṃ prāhus te api nirvarṇita-uttarāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03450_0: pratyakṣās tad-viviktaṃ ca na anyat kiṃcid vibhāvyate
SA15dhkprvku:03450_1: yat taj-jñānam paro apy enāṃ bhuñjīta anyena vid yadi
SA15dhkprvku:03451_0: tajjā tat pratibhāsā vā yadi dhīr vetti na aparā
SA15dhkprvku:03451_1: ālambamānasya anyasya apy asty avaśyam idaṃ dvayam
SA15dhkprvku:03452_0: atha na utpadyate tasmān na ca tat pratibhāsinī
SA15dhkprvku:03452_1: sā dhīrn nirviṣayā prāptā sāmānyaṃ ca tad-agrahe
SA15dhkprvku:03453_0: na gṛhyata iti proktaṃ na ca tad-vastu kiṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:03453_1: tasmād artha-avabhāso asau na anyas tasyā dhiyas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03454_1: na adhyakṣam iti ced eṣa kuto bhedaḥ samarthayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03455_1: sarvathā anyo na gṛhṇīyāt saṃvid bhedo apy apoditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03456_0: yeṣāṃ ca yogino anyasya pratyakṣeṇa sukha-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:03456_1: vidanti tulya-anubhavās tadvat te api syur āturāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03457_1: na udeti duḥkham iti cet na vai duḥkha-samudbhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03459_0: bhāsamānaṃ svarūpeṇa pīḍā duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ yadā
SA15dhkprvku:03459_1: na tad-ālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na tadā evaṃ prayujyate
SA15dhkprvku:03460_1: artha-sārūpyam ālamba ātmā vittiḥ svayaṃ sphuṭaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03461_0: api ca adhyakṣatā abhāve dhiyaḥ syāl liṅgato gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03461_1: tac ca akṣam artho dhīḥ pūrvo manaskāro api vā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03463_0: tathā artho dhī-manaskārau jñānaṃ tau ca na sidhyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03463_1: na aprasiddhasya liṅgatvaṃ vyaktir arthasya cen matā
SA15dhkprvku:03464_0: liṅgaṃ sā eva nanu jñānaṃ vyakto artho anena varṇitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03465_0: atha arthasya eva kaścit sa viśeṣo vyaktir iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:03466_0: tad iṣṭau vā pratijñānaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ prasajyate
SA15dhkprvku:03466_1: sa ca jñāto athavā ajñāto bhavej jñātasya liṅgatā
SA15dhkprvku:03467_0: yadi jñāte aparicchinne jñāto asāv iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03467_1: jñātatvena aparicchinnam api tad gamakaṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:03468_0: adṛṣṭa-dṛṣṭayo anyena draṣṭā dṛṣṭā na hi kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:03468_1: viśeṣaḥ so anya-dṛṣṭāv apy asti iti syāt sva-dhī-gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03469_1: kevalān na artha-dharmāt kaḥ sva-dharmaḥ sva-dhiyo paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03470_1: tasya bhedaḥ kuto buddher vyabhicāry-anyajaś ca saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03471_1: muktvā na kāryam aparaṃ tasyāḥ samupalabhyate
SA15dhkprvku:03472_0: tatra atyakṣaṃ dvayaṃ pañcasv artheṣv eko api na īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:03473_0: yad evam apratītaṃ tal liṅgam ity apy alaukikam
SA15dhkprvku:03473_1: vidyamāne api liṅge tāṃ tena sārdham apaśyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03474_0: kathaṃ pratīti-liṅgaṃ hi na adṛṣṭasya prakāśakam
SA15dhkprvku:03474_1: tata eva asya liṅgāt prāk prasiddher upavarṇane
SA15dhkprvku:03475_1: ity arthasya dhiyaḥ siddhiḥ na arthāt tasyāḥ kathaṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:03476_1: pratyakṣāṃ ca dhiyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāś ca iṣṭa-abhidhā-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:03477_0: para-citta-anumānaṃ ca na syād ātmany adarśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:03478_0: prakāśitā kathaṃ vā syāt buddhir buddhy-antareṇa vaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03479_1: sa ca prakāśas tad-rūpaḥ svayam eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:03480_0: tathā abhyupagame buddheḥ buddhau buddhiḥ svavedikā
SA15dhkprvku:03480_1: siddhā anyathā tulya-dharmā viṣayo api dhiyā saha
SA15dhkprvku:03481_0: iti prakāśa-rūpā naḥ svayaṃ dhīḥ samprakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:03482_0: sādṛśye api hi dhīr anyā prakāśyā na tayā matā
SA15dhkprvku:03484_1: tasmād yato ayaṃ tasya api vācyam anyasya darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:03485_0: smṛter apy ātmavit siddhā jñānasya anyena vedane
SA15dhkprvku:03486_1: varṇaḥ syād akramo dīrghaḥ kramavān akramāṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:03487_1: akrameṇa grahād anta-krama-vad dhīś ca no bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03488_0: āntyaṃ pūrva-sthitād ūrdhvaṃ vardhamāno dhvanir bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03489_0: sthāne svayaṃ na naśyet sā paścād apy aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03490_0: sakṛd yatna-udbhavād vyarthaḥ syād yatnaś ca uttarottaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03490_1: vyaktāv apy eṣa varṇānāṃ doṣaḥ samanuṣajyate
SA15dhkprvku:03491_0: anekayā tad-grahaṇe yā antyā dhīḥ sā anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:03491_1: na dīrgha-grāhikā sā ca tan na syād dīrgha-dhī-smṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03492_0: pṛthak pṛthak ca buddhīnāṃ saṃvittau tad-dhvaniḥ śruteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03492_1: avicchinna-ābhatā na syād ghaṭanaṃ ca nirākṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:03493_0: vicchinnaṃ śṛṇvato apy asya yady avicchinna-vibhramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03496_0: eka-aṇv-atyaya-kālaś ca kālo alpīyān kṣaṇo mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03496_1: buddhiś ca kṣaṇikā tasmāt kramād varṇān prapadyate
SA15dhkprvku:03497_1: vicchinnā apy anyayā buddhiḥ sarvā syād vitatha-arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:03498_0: ghaṭanaṃ yac ca bhāvānām anyatra indriya-vibhramāt
SA15dhkprvku:03499_1: na akṣa-grāhye asti śabdānāṃ yojanā iti vivecitam
SA15dhkprvku:03500_0: vicchinnaṃ paśyato apy akṣair ghaṭayed yadi kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:03500_1: arthasya tat saṃvitteś ca satataṃ bhāsamānayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03501_0: bādhake asati san nyāye vicchinna iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03501_1: buddhīnāṃ śakti-niyamād iti cet sa kuto mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03502_0: yugapad buddhy-adṛṣṭeś cet tad eva idaṃ vicāryate
SA15dhkprvku:03503_0: tathā hi samyak lakṣyante vikalpāḥ krama-bhāvinaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03504_0: spaṣṭa-avabhāsāaṃ pratyakṣāṃ kalpayet so api vāritaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03505_0: pratīta-bhede apy adhyakṣā dhīḥ kathaṃ tādṛśī bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03506_1: sa eva ayam iti jñānaṃ na asti tac ca akṣaje kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03507_0: na ca artha-jñāna-saṃvittyor yugapat sambhavo yataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03507_1: lakṣyate pratibhāsau dvau na artha-artha-jñānayoḥ pṛthak
SA15dhkprvku:03508_0: na hy artha-ābhāsi ca jñānam artho bāhyaś ca kevalaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03509_0: sūpalakṣyeṇa bhedena yau saṃvittau na lakṣitau
SA15dhkprvku:03509_1: artha-artha-pratyayau paścāt smaryete tau pṛthak katham
SA15dhkprvku:03511_1: na hi saṃvedanaṃ śuddhaṃ bhaved arthasya vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:03512_0: tathā hi nīla-ādy-ākāra eka ekaṃ ca vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:03512_1: lakṣyate na tu nīla-ābhe vedane vedanaṃ param
SA15dhkprvku:03513_0: jñāna-antareṇa anubhavo bhavet tatra api ca smṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03513_1: dṛṣṭā tad-vedanaṃ kena tasya apy anyena ced imām
SA15dhkprvku:03514_0: mālāṃ jñāna-vidāṃ ko ayaṃ janayaty anubandhinīm
SA15dhkprvku:03514_1: pūrvā dhīḥ sā eva cen na syāt saṃcāro viṣaya-antare
SA15dhkprvku:03515_1: agṛhītvā uttaraṃ jñānaṃ gṛhṇīyād aparaṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:03516_0: ātmani jñāna-janane svabhāve niyatāṃ ca tām
SA15dhkprvku:03516_1: ko nāma anyo vibadhnīyād bahir-aṅge antaraṅgikām
SA15dhkprvku:03517_0: bāhyaḥ saṃnihito apy arthaḥ tāṃ vibandhuṃ hi na prabhuḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03517_1: dhiyaṃ na anubhavet kaścid anyathā arthasya saṃnidhau
SA15dhkprvku:03518_0: na ca saṃnihita-arthā asti daśā kācid ato dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03518_1: utsanna-mūlā smṛtir apy utsannā ity ujjvalaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:03520_1: viṣaya-antara-saṃcāro yadi sā eva artha-dhīḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03521_0: śakti-kṣaye pūrva-dhiyaḥ na hi dhīḥ prāg dhiyā vinā
SA15dhkprvku:03523_0: na apekṣeta anyathā sāmyaṃ mano-vṛtter mano antaram
SA15dhkprvku:03524_0: ekatvān manaso anyasmin saktasya anya-agater yadi
SA15dhkprvku:03525_0: samavṛttau ca tulyatvāt sarvadā anya-agatir bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03525_1: janma ca ātma-mano yoga-mātrajānāṃ sakṛd bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03526_0: ekā eva cet kriyā ekaḥ syāt kiṃ dīpo aneka-darśanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03526_1: krameṇa api na śaktaṃ syāt paścād apy aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03527_0: anena deha puruṣāv uktau saṃskārato yadi
SA15dhkprvku:03527_1: niyamaḥ sa kutaḥ paścād buddheś ced astu sammatam
SA15dhkprvku:03528_0: na grāhyatā anyā jananāj jananaṃ grāhya-lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:03528_1: agrāhyaṃ na hi tejo asti na ca saukṣmya-ādy-anaṃśake
SA15dhkprvku:03529_1: grāhyatāyā na khalv anyaj jananaṃ grāhya-lakṣaṇe
SA15dhkprvku:03530_0: sākṣān na hy anyathā buddhe rūpa-ādir upakārakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03531_0: buddher api tad asti iti sā api tattve vyavasthitā
SA15dhkprvku:03532_0: rūpa-ādeś cetasaś ca evam aviśuddha-dhiyaṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:03533_1: rūpa-ādi-buddheḥ kiṃ jātaṃ paścād yat prāṅ na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:03534_0: sati sva-dhī-grahe tasmāt sā eva anantara-hetutā
SA15dhkprvku:03534_1: cetaso grāhyatā sā eva tato na artha-antarā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03535_1: prakṛtyā eva iti gaditaṃ nānā-ekasmān na ced bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:03536_0: na kiṃcid ekam ekasmāt sāmagryāḥ sarva-sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03536_1: ekaṃ syād api sāmagrayor ity uktaṃ tad anekakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:03537_0: arthaṃ pūrvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ gṛhṇīyād yadi dhīḥ parā
SA15dhkprvku:03538_1: dvir dvir ekaṃ ca bhāseta bhāsanād ātma-tad-vidoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03540_0: ātma-anubhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na anubhūtaṃ parair yadi
SA15dhkprvku:03540_1: ātma-anubhūtiḥ sā siddhā kṛto yena evam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:03541_0: vyakti-hetv-aprasiddhiḥ syān na vyakter vyaktam icchataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:03541_1: vyakty-asiddhāv api vyaktaṃ yadi vyaktam idaṃ jagat
SA15dhkprvku:04001_0: parasya pratipādyatvād adṛṣṭo api svayaṃ paraiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04001_1: dṛṣṭaḥ sādhanam ity eke tat-kṣepāya ātma-dṛg-vacaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04002_1: vācaḥ prāmāṇyam asmin hi na anumānaṃ pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:04003_0: bādhanāya āgamasya ukteḥ sādhanasya paraṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:04003_1: so apramāṇaṃ tadā asiddhaṃ tat-siddham akhilaṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04004_0: tad-āgamavataḥ siddhaṃ yadi kasya ka āgamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04004_1: bādhyamānaḥ pramāṇena sa siddhaḥ katham āgamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04005_0: tad-viruddha-abhyupagamas tena eva ca kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:04006_0: tat kasmāt sādhanaṃ na uktaṃ sva-pratītir yad udbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:04006_1: yuktyā yayā āgamo grāhyo grāhikā asya api sā na kim
SA15dhkprvku:04007_1: sādhanaiḥ sādhanāny artha-śakti-jñāne asya tāny alam
SA15dhkprvku:04008_0: vicchinna-anugamā ye ca sāmānyena apy agocarāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04008_1: sādhya-sādhana-cintā asti na teṣv artheṣu kācana
SA15dhkprvku:04010_0: sann artho jñāna-sāpekṣo na asan jñānena sādhakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04010_1: sato api vastv-asaṃśliṣṭā asaṃgatyā sadṛśī gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04011_0: liṅgaṃ svabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ vā dṛśya-adarśanam eva vā
SA15dhkprvku:04011_1: sambaddhaṃ vastutaḥ siddhaṃ tad asiddhaṃ kim ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04012_0: pareṇa apy anyato gantum ayuktaṃ para-kalpitaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04014_1: vastunaś ca anyathā abhāvāt kalpitā vyabhicāriṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04015_1: na arthe tena tayorn na asti svataḥ sādhana-saṃsthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04016_1: pramāṇaṃ saṃśaya-utpatteḥ tataḥ sākṣān na sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:04017_0: sādhyasya eva abhidhānena pāraṃparyeṇa na apy alam
SA15dhkprvku:04017_1: śaktasya sūcakaṃ hetu-vaco aśaktam api svayam
SA15dhkprvku:04018_1: śaktis tasya api ced hetu-vacanasya pravartanāt
SA15dhkprvku:04019_1: vipakṣa-upagame apy etat tulyam ity anavasthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04020_0: antaraṅgaṃ tu sāmarthyaṃ triṣu rūpeṣu saṃsthitam
SA15dhkprvku:04021_1: viṣaya-khyāpanād eva siddhau cet tasya śaktatā
SA15dhkprvku:04022_0: vyāpti-pūrve vinā apy asmāt kṛtakaḥ śabda īdṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04022_1: sarve anityā iti prokte apy arthāt tan nāśa-dhīr bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:04023_1: triṣv anyatam arūpasya eva anuktir nyūnatā uditā
SA15dhkprvku:04024_0: sādhya-uktiṃ vā pratijñāṃ sa vadan doṣair na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:04026_0: siddha-ukteḥ sādhanatvāc cet parasya api na duṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:04027_1: asambaddhā tathā hy eṣa na nyāya iti sūcitam
SA15dhkprvku:04029_1: anukto api icchayā vyāptaḥ sādhya ātma-artha-van mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04030_1: vṛttau svayaṃ śruteḥ prāha kṛtā ca eṣā tad-arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:04031_1: anuktāv api vāñchāyā bhavet prakaraṇād gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04032_0: ananvayo api dṛṣṭānte doṣas tasya yathoditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04032_1: ātmā paraś cet so asiddha iti tatra iṣṭa-ghātakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:04033_0: sādhanaṃ yad vivāde na nyastaṃ tac cen na sādhyate
SA15dhkprvku:04033_1: kiṃ sādhyam anyathā aniṣṭaṃ bhaved vaiphalyam eva vā
SA15dhkprvku:04034_1: etena kathite sādhyaṃ sāmānyena atha sammatam
SA15dhkprvku:04035_0: tad eva artha-antara-abhāvād deha-anāptau na sidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:04035_1: vācyaṃ śūnyaṃ pralapatāṃ tad etaj jāḍya-cintitam
SA15dhkprvku:04036_0: tulyaṃ nāśe api cec śabda-ghaṭa-bhedena kalpane
SA15dhkprvku:04036_1: na siddhena vināśena tadvataḥ sādhanād dhvaneḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04037_0: tathā artha-antara-bhāve syāt tadvān kumbho apy anityatā
SA15dhkprvku:04037_1: viśiṣṭā dhvaninā anveti no cen na ayoga-vāraṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:04038_1: vyavacchedād ayoge tu na anyena ananvaya-āgamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04039_0: sāmānyam eva tat sādhyaṃ na ca siddha-prasādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:04039_1: viśiṣṭaṃ dharmiṇā tac ca na niranvaya-doṣavat
SA15dhkprvku:04041_1: sādhyaṃ yatas tathā na iṣṭaṃ sādhyo dharmo atra kevalaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04042_1: sādhyaḥ syād ātmanā eva iṣṭa ity upāttā svayaṃ-śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04043_1: tatra ekasya api doṣaḥ syād yadi hetu-pratijñayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04044_1: hetur viruddho aprakṛter no ced anyatra sā samā
SA15dhkprvku:04045_0: atha atra dharmī prakṛtas tatra śāstra-artha-bādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:04046_0: kaiścit prakaraṇair icchā bhavet sā gamyate ca taiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04046_1: balāt tava icchā iyam iti vyaktam īśvara-ceṣṭitam
SA15dhkprvku:04047_0: vadan na kārya-liṅgāṃ tāṃ vyabhicāreṇa bādhyate
SA15dhkprvku:04047_1: anāntarīyake ca arthe bādhite anyasya kā kṣatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04048_0: uktaṃ ca na āgama-apekṣam anumānaṃ sva-gocare
SA15dhkprvku:04048_1: siddhaṃ tena susiddhaṃ tan na tadā śāstram īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:04049_0: vāda-tyāgas tadā syāc cen na tadā anabhyupāyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04049_1: upāyo hy abhyupāye ayam anaṅgaṃ sa tadā api san
SA15dhkprvku:04050_1: cikīrṣoḥ sa hi kālaḥ syāt tadā śāstreṇa bādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:04052_0: tatra api sādhya-dharmasya sambaddhasya eva bādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:04053_0: kena iyaṃ sarva-cintāsu śāstraṃ grāhyam iti sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04053_1: kṛtā idānīm asiddhāntair grāhyo dhūmena na analaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04054_1: vilabdhā bata kena amī siddhānta-viṣam agrahāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04055_0: yadi sādhana ekatra sarvaṃ śāstraṃ nidarśane
SA15dhkprvku:04055_1: darśayet sādhanaṃ syād ity eṣā lokottarā sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04056_0: asambaddhasya dharmasya kim asiddhau na sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:04056_1: hetus tat-sādhanāya uktaḥ kiṃ duṣṭas tatra sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:04057_0: dharmān anupanīya eva dṛṣṭānte dharmiṇo akhilān
SA15dhkprvku:04058_0: svabhāvaṃ kāraṇaṃ vā artho avyabhicāreṇa sādhayan
SA15dhkprvku:04059_0: prapadyamānaś ca anyas taṃ nāntarīyakam īpsitaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04060_0: ukto anukto api ced hetur virodho vādino atra kim
SA15dhkprvku:04060_1: na hi tasya ukti-doṣeṇa sa jātaḥ śāstra-bādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:04061_0: bādhakasya abhidhānāc ced doṣo yadi vaden na saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04061_1: kiṃ na bādheta so akurvan na yuktaṃ kena duṣyati
SA15dhkprvku:04062_1: duṣyed vyartha-abhidhānena na atra tasya prasādhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:04063_0: yadi kiṃcit kvacic śāstre na yuktaṃ pratiṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:04063_1: bruvāṇo yuktam apy anyad iti rājakula-sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04064_0: sarvān arthān samīkṛtya vaktuṃ śakyaṃ na sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:04066_1: asambandhe api bādhā cet syāt sarvaṃ sarva-bādhakam
SA15dhkprvku:04067_0: sambandhas tena tatra eva bādhanād asti ced asat
SA15dhkprvku:04068_0: nāntarīyakatā-sādhye sambandhaḥ sā iha na īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:04068_1: kevalaṃ śāstra-pīḍā iha doṣaḥ sā anyakṛte samā
SA15dhkprvku:04071_0: anīpsitam asādhyaṃ ced vādinā anyo apy anīpsitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04071_1: dharmo asādhyas tadā asādhyaṃ bādhamānaṃ virodhi kim
SA15dhkprvku:04072_1: śāstreṣv icchā-pravṛtty-artho yadi śaṅkā kuto anviyam
SA15dhkprvku:04073_0: so aniṣiddhaḥ pramāṇena gṛhṇan kena nivāryate
SA15dhkprvku:04073_1: niṣiddhaś cet pramāṇena vācā kena pravartyate
SA15dhkprvku:04074_0: pūrvam apy eṣa siddhāntaṃ sva-icchayā eva gṛhītavān
SA15dhkprvku:04074_1: kathaṃcid anyaṃ sa punar grahītuṃ labhate na kim
SA15dhkprvku:04075_0: dṛṣṭer vipratipattīnām atra akarṣīt svayaṃ śrutim
SA15dhkprvku:04078_1: svarūpeṇa eva nirdeśya iti anena eva tad gatam
SA15dhkprvku:04079_1: sādhyatvena eva nirdeśya iti idaṃ phala-vad bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:04080_1: iha evaṃ na hy anukte api kiṃcit pakṣe virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:04081_0: kuryāc ced dharmiṇaṃ sādhyaṃ tataḥ kiṃ tan na śakyate
SA15dhkprvku:04081_1: kasmād hetv-anvaya-abhāvān na ca doṣas tayor ayam
SA15dhkprvku:04088_0: iha anaṅgam iṣern niṣṭhā tena īpsita-pade punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04089_0: avācakatvāc ca ayuktaṃ tena iṣṭaṃ svayam ātmanā
SA15dhkprvku:04089_1: anapekṣya akhilaṃ śāstraṃ tad abhīṣṭasya sādhyatā
SA15dhkprvku:04090_0: tena anabhīṣṭa-saṃsṛṣṭasya iṣṭasya api hi bādhane
SA15dhkprvku:04090_1: yathā sādhyam abādhātaḥ pakṣa-hetū na duṣyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04091_0: aniṣiddhaḥ pramāṇābhyāṃ sa ca upagama iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:04092_0: anumānasya bhedena sā bādhā uktā caturvidhā
SA15dhkprvku:04092_1: tatra abhyupāyaḥ kārya-aṅgaṃ svabhāva-aṅgaṃ jagat sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04093_1: āptaḥ sva-vacanaṃ śāstraṃ ca evam uktaṃ samatvataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04094_0: yathā ātmano apramāṇatve vacanaṃ na pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:04094_1: śāstra-dṛṣṭe tathā na arthe vicāras tad anāśraye
SA15dhkprvku:04095_0: tat prastāva-āśrayatve hi śāstraṃ bādhakam ity amum
SA15dhkprvku:04095_1: vaktum arthaṃ sva-vācā asya sahoktiḥ sāmya-dṛṣṭaye
SA15dhkprvku:04096_0: udāharaṇam apy atra sadṛśaṃ tena varṇitam
SA15dhkprvku:04098_0: śāstriṇo apy atadālambe viruddha-uktau tu vastuni
SA15dhkprvku:04098_1: na bādhā pratibandhaḥ syāt tulya-kakṣyatayā dvayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04099_0: yathā sva-vāci tac ca asyā tadā sva-vacana-ātmakam
SA15dhkprvku:04099_1: tayoḥ pramāṇaṃ yasya asti tat syād anyasya bādhakam
SA15dhkprvku:04100_1: tulya-kakṣyā yathārthaṃ vā bādheta katham anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:04101_0: prāmāṇyam āgamānāṃ ca prāg eva vinivāritam
SA15dhkprvku:04103_0: anyathā atiprasaṅgaḥ syād vyarthatā vā pṛthak kṛteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04104_1: bādhakaṃ yadi na icchet sa bādhakaṃ kiṃ punar bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:04105_1: puruṣa-icchā kṛtā ca asya paripūrṇā pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:04106_0: tasmāt prasiddheṣv artheṣu śāstra-tyāge api na kṣatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04106_1: parokṣeṣv āgama-aniṣṭau na cintā eva pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:04108_0: śāstraṃ yat siddhayā yuktyā sva-vācā ca na bādhyate
SA15dhkprvku:04108_1: dṛṣṭe adṛṣṭe api tad grāhyam iti cintā pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:04111_1: kṛtānām akṛtānāṃ vā yogyaṃ viśvaṃ svabhāvataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04113_1: sarvo asyām apratīte api tasmiṃs tat-siddhatā tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04114_0: asādhāraṇatā na syāt bādhā-hetor iha anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:04114_1: tan niṣedho anumānāt syāc śabda-arthe anakṣa-vṛttitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04115_0: asādhāraṇatā tatra hetūnāṃ yatra na anvayi
SA15dhkprvku:04115_1: sattvam ity abhyudāhāro hetor evaṃ phalo mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04117_1: abhāvaṃ darśayaty evaṃ pratīter anumā tv ataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04118_0: athavā bruvato lokasya anumā abhāva ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:04119_1: bhinnasya atad-vaśād vṛttis tad icchājā iti sūcitam
SA15dhkprvku:04120_0: candratāṃ śaśino anicchan kāṃ pratītiṃ sa vāñchati
SA15dhkprvku:04120_1: iti taṃ praty adṛṣṭāntaṃ tad-asādhāraṇaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:04121_0: na udāharaṇam eva idam adhikṛtya idam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:04121_1: lakṣaṇatvāt tathā avṛkṣo dhātrī ity uktau ca bādhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:04123_0: yadi tasya kvacit sidhyet siddhaṃ vastu-balena tat
SA15dhkprvku:04124_0: tasya vastuni siddhasya śaśiny apy anivāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:04124_1: tad-vastv-abhāve śaśini vāraṇe api na duṣyati
SA15dhkprvku:04127_1: na ity anena uktam atra eṣāṃ pratiṣedho virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:04128_0: naimittikyāḥ śruter artham arthaṃ vā pāramārthikam
SA15dhkprvku:04128_1: śabdānāṃ pratirundhāno na bādhyas tena varṇitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04131_1: prasiddhasya śrutau rūpaṃ yad eva pratibhāsate
SA15dhkprvku:04132_1: tad-artha-artha-uktir asya eva kṣepe adhyakṣeṇa bādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:04133_0: tad eva rūpaṃ tatra arthaḥ śeṣaṃ vyāvṛtti-lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:04133_1: avastu-rūpaṃ sāmānyam atas tan na akṣa-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04134_1: pratikṣepe apy abādhā iti śrāvaṇa-uktyā prakāśitam
SA15dhkprvku:04136_0: sarvatra vādino dharmo yaḥ sva-sādhyatayā īpsitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04136_1: tad dharmavati bādhā syān na anya-dharmeṇa dharmiṇi
SA15dhkprvku:04137_0: anyathā asya uparodhaḥ ko bādhite anyatra dharmiṇi
SA15dhkprvku:04137_1: gata-arthe lakṣaṇe na asmin sva-dharmi-vacanaṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04138_0: bādhāyāṃ dharmiṇo api syāt bādhā ity asya prasiddhaye
SA15dhkprvku:04139_0: anyathā evaṃvidho dharmaḥ sādhya ity abhidhānataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04139_1: tad bādhām eva manyeta sva-dharmi-vacanaṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04140_0: nanv etad apy artha-siddhaṃ satyaṃ kecit tu dharmiṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04140_1: kevalasya uparodhe api doṣavat tām upāgatāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04141_0: yathā parair anutpādyā pūrva-rūpan na kha-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:04141_1: sakṛc śabda-ādy-ahetutvād ity ukte prāha dūṣakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04142_0: tadvad vastu-svabhāvo asan dharmī vyoma-ādir ity api
SA15dhkprvku:04142_1: na evam iṣṭasya sādhyasya bādhā kvacana vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:04143_0: dvayasya api hi sādhyatve sādhya-dharma-uparodhi yat
SA15dhkprvku:04143_1: bādhanaṃ dharmiṇas tatra bādhā ity etena varṇitam
SA15dhkprvku:04144_0: tathā eva dharmiṇo apy atra sādhyatvāt kevalasya na
SA15dhkprvku:04144_1: yady evam atra bādhā syāt na anya-anutpādya-śaktikaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04145_1: virodhitā bhavet atra hetur aikāntiko yadi
SA15dhkprvku:04146_1: vyāvṛtteḥ saṃśayād eṣa śeṣavad bheda iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:04147_0: svayam iṣṭo yato dharmaḥ sādhyas tasmāt tad-āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04147_1: bādhyo na kevalo na anya-saṃśrayo vā iti sūcitam
SA15dhkprvku:04148_0: svayaṃ śrutyā anya-dharmāṇāṃ bādhā abādhā iti kathyate
SA15dhkprvku:04148_1: tathā sva-dharmiṇā anyasya dharmiṇo api iti kathyate
SA15dhkprvku:04150_1: tena ity uktam ato apakṣa-doṣo asiddha-āśraya-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:04152_1: dravya-lakṣaṇa-yukto anyaḥ saṃyoge artho asti dṛṣṭi-bhāk
SA15dhkprvku:04153_1: iṣṭo hy avayavī kāryaṃ dṛṣṭyā adṛśyeṣv asambhavī
SA15dhkprvku:04154_1: gurutva-adhogatī syātāṃ yady asau syāt tulā-natiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04155_0: tan nirguṇa-kriyas tasmāt samavāyi na kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:04155_1: tata eva na dṛśyo asāv adṛṣṭeḥ kārya-rūpayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04156_1: ā sūkṣmād dravyam ālāyās tulyatvād aṃśu-pāta-vat
SA15dhkprvku:04157_0: dravya-antara-gurutvasya gatirn na ity aparo abravīt
SA15dhkprvku:04157_1: tasya krameṇa saṃyukte pāṃśu-rāśau sakṛd yute
SA15dhkprvku:04158_0: bhedaḥ syād gaurave tasmāt pṛthak saha ca tolite
SA15dhkprvku:04159_1: gurutvaṃ kāryam ālāya yadi na eva upalakṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:04160_0: ā sarṣapād gurutvaṃ tad durlakṣitam analpakam
SA15dhkprvku:04161_0: nanv adṛṣṭo aṃśu-vat so artho na ca tat-kāryam īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:04163_1: udāharaṇam apy anyad diśā gamyam yathoktayā
SA15dhkprvku:04164_1: tathā param pratinyastam sādhyaṃ na iṣṭaṃ tadā api tat
SA15dhkprvku:04165_1: tasmāt sādhya-śrutirn na iṣṭaṃ viśeṣam avalambate
SA15dhkprvku:04167_0: sarvasya ca aprasiddhatvāt kathaṃcit tena na kṣamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04170_1: śāstreṇa alaṃ yathāyogaṃ loka eva pravartatām
