SA15dhkprvku:04172_1: vyarthā vyāpti-phalā sā uktiḥ sāmarthyād gamyate tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04174_0: pakṣa-doṣaḥ para-apekṣo na iti ca pratipāditam
SA15dhkprvku:04174_1: iṣṭa-asambhavy-asiddhaś ca sa eva syāt nirākṛtaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04175_1: dṛṣṭānta-ākhyān ato anyat kim asty atra artha-anudarśanam
SA15dhkprvku:04176_1: na tad-vyāpteḥ phalaṃ vā kiṃ sāmānyena anuvartane
SA15dhkprvku:04177_0: syān nirākaraṇaṃ śabde sthitena eva ity ato abravīt
SA15dhkprvku:04177_1: viruddha-viṣaye anyasmin vadann āha anyatāṃ śruteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04178_0: sā ca bheda-apratikṣepāt sāmānyānāṃ na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:04178_1: vṛkṣo na śiṃśapā eva iti yathā prakaraṇe kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:04179_0: sarva-śruter eka-vṛttirn niṣedhaḥ syān na tāvatā
SA15dhkprvku:04181_1: sarvatra doṣas tulyaś cen na saṃvṛtyā viśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04184_1: dharmī dharmāś ca bhāsante vyavahāras tad-āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04185_1: sādhyaḥ sādhanatāṃ nītas tena asiddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04187_0: pakṣa-aṅgatve apy abādhatvān na asiddhir bhinna-dharmiṇi
SA15dhkprvku:04187_1: yathā aśvo na viṣāṇitvād eṣa piṇḍo viṣāṇavān
SA15dhkprvku:04188_0: sādhya-kāla-aṅgatā vā na nivṛtter upalakṣya tat
SA15dhkprvku:04188_1: viśeṣo api pratijñā-artho dharma-bhedān na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:04190_0: ayogaṃ yogam aparair atyantāyogam eva ca
SA15dhkprvku:04191_1: vivakṣāto prayoge api tasya artho ayaṃ pratīyate
SA15dhkprvku:04192_1: pārtho dhanurdharo nīlaṃ sarojam iti vā yathā
SA15dhkprvku:04196_0: na hi svabhāvād anyena vyāptir gamyasya kāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:04197_0: prayatnānantaraṃ jñānaṃ prāk sato niyamena na
SA15dhkprvku:04199_0: etena eva prasiddho api svabhāvasya pṛthak kṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04199_1: kāryeṇa saha nirdeśe mā jñāsīt sarvam īdṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:04200_1: prabheda-mātram ākhyātaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tu na bhidyate
SA15dhkprvku:04201_0: tena atra kārya-liṅgena svabhāvo apy ekadeśa-bhāk
SA15dhkprvku:04202_0: yan nāntarīyakā sattā yo vā ātmā svo avibhāgavān
SA15dhkprvku:04202_1: sa tena avyabhicārī syād ity arthaṃ tat prabhedanam
SA15dhkprvku:04203_0: saṃyogy-ādiṣu yeṣv asti pratibandho na tādṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:04203_1: na te hetava ity uktaṃ vyabhicārasya sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:04204_0: sati vā pratibandhes tu sa eva gati-sādhanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04204_1: niyamo hy avinābhāvo anityaś ca na sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:04205_1: tac ca na apratibaddheṣu tata eva anvaya-sthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04206_0: svātmatve hetu-bhāve vā siddhe hi vyatirekitā
SA15dhkprvku:04206_1: sidhyaty ato viśeṣe na vyatireko na ca anvayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04207_1: uktā anaikāntikas tasmād anyathā gamako bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:04208_1: ātmano vinivarteta prāṇa-ādir yadi tac ca na
SA15dhkprvku:04209_1: tadātmā tat-prasūtaś cen na etad ātma-upalambhane
SA15dhkprvku:04210_0: tasya upalabdhāv agatāv agatau ca prasidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:04210_1: te ca atyantaparokṣasya dṛṣṭy-adṛṣṭī na sidhyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04211_0: anyatra adṛṣṭa-rūpasya ghaṭa-ādau na iti vā kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04212_0: prāṇa-ādeś ca kvacid dṛṣṭyā sattva-asattvaṃ pratīyate
SA15dhkprvku:04212_1: tathā ātmā yadi dṛśyeta sattva-asattvaṃ pratīyate
SA15dhkprvku:04213_0: yasya hetor abhāvena ghaṭe prāṇo na dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:04213_1: dehe api yady asau na syād yukto dehena sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04214_0: bhinne api kiṃcit sādharmyād yadi tattvaṃ pratīyate
SA15dhkprvku:04214_1: prameyatvād ghaṭa-ādīnāṃ sātmatvaṃ kiṃ na mīyate
SA15dhkprvku:04215_0: aniṣṭaṃ cet pramāṇaṃ hi sarva-iṣṭīnāṃ nibandhanam
SA15dhkprvku:04215_1: bhāva-abhāva-vyavasthāṃ kaḥ kartuṃ tena vinā prabhuḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04218_1: na tasya vyabhicāritvād vyatireke api cet katham
SA15dhkprvku:04219_0: na asādhyād eva viśleṣas tasya nanv evam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:04219_1: sādhye anuvṛtty-abhāvo arthāt tasya anyatra apy asau samaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04220_0: asādhyād eva viccheda iti sādhye astitā ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:04220_1: arthāpattyā ata eva uktam ekena dvaya-darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:04222_0: nivṛttirn na asataḥ sādhyād asādhyeṣv eva no tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04222_1: na iti sā eva nivṛttiḥ kiṃ nivṛtter asato matā
SA15dhkprvku:04223_0: nivṛtty-abhāvas tu vidhir vastu-bhāvo asato api san
SA15dhkprvku:04223_1: vastv-abhāvas tu na asti iti paśya bāndhya-vijṛmbhitam
SA15dhkprvku:04224_0: nivṛttir yadi tasmin na hetor vṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:04224_1: sā api na pratiṣedho ayaṃ nivṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:04225_0: vidhānaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ ca muktvā śābdo asti na aparaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04225_1: vyavahāraḥ sa ca asatsu na iti prāptā atra mūkatā
SA15dhkprvku:04226_0: satāṃ ca na niṣedho asti so asatsu ca na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:04226_1: jagaty anena nyāyena nañ-arthaḥ pralayaṃ gataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04227_0: deśa-kāla-niṣedhaś ced yathā asti sa niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:04227_1: na tathā na yathā so asti tathā api na niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:04229_0: tābhyāṃ sa dharmī sambaddhaḥ khyāty-abhāve api tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04229_1: śabda-pravṛtter asti iti so api iṣṭo vyavahāra-bhāk
SA15dhkprvku:04232_1: vidhāv ekasya tad-bhājām iva anyeṣām upekṣakam
SA15dhkprvku:04233_0: niṣedhe tad-viviktaṃ ca tad anyeṣām apekṣakam
SA15dhkprvku:04235_0: tat-phalo atat-phalaś ca artho bhinna ekas tatas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04236_1: dṛṣṭiṃ bheda-āśrayais te api tasmād ajñāta-viplavāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04237_0: sattā-sādhana-vṛtteś ca sandigdhaḥ syād asan na saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04237_1: asattvaṃ ca abhyupagamād apramāṇān na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:04239_1: dvairāśye saty adṛṣṭe api syād adṛṣṭeṣu saṃśayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04241_0: bhāve virodhasya adṛṣṭau kaḥ sandehaṃ nivartayet
SA15dhkprvku:04241_1: kvacid viniyamāt ko anyas tat-kārya-ātmatayā sa ca
SA15dhkprvku:04242_0: nairātmyād api tena asya sandigdhaṃ vinivartanam
SA15dhkprvku:04242_1: astu nāma tathā apy ātmā na anairātmyāt prasidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:04243_0: yena asau vyatirekasya na abhāvaṃ bhāvam icchati
SA15dhkprvku:04243_1: yathā na avyatireke api prāṇa-ādirn na sapakṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04244_0: sapakṣa-avyatirekī ced hetur hetur ato anvayī
SA15dhkprvku:04244_1: na anvayy avyatirekī ced anairātmyaṃ na sātmakam
SA15dhkprvku:04245_0: yan nāntarīyakaḥ svātmā yasya siddhaḥ pravṛttiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:04245_1: nivartakaḥ sa eva ataḥ pravṛttau ca pravartakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04246_1: kārye dṛṣṭir adṛṣṭiś ca kāryakāraṇatā hi te
SA15dhkprvku:04248_1: tair vinā bhavato anyasmāt tajjaṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:04249_1: sā cen na bhedikā prāptam eka-rūpam idaṃ jagat
SA15dhkprvku:04251_0: tat tasya ajananaṃ rūpam anyasya yadi sā eva sā
SA15dhkprvku:04251_1: na tasya ajananaṃ rūpaṃ tat tasyāḥ sambhavet katham
SA15dhkprvku:04252_1: tasmāt sva-dṛṣṭāv iva tad dṛṣṭe kārye api gamyate
SA15dhkprvku:04253_1: drava-śakter yataḥ kledaḥ sā tv ekā eva dvayor api
SA15dhkprvku:04254_0: bhinna-abhinnaḥ kim asya ātmā bhinno atha dravatā katham
SA15dhkprvku:04254_1: abhinnā ity ucyate buddhes tad-rūpāyā abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04255_1: yena aṃśena adadhad dhūmaṃ tena aṃśena tathā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04256_1: dhūmo atad-vyabhicāri iti siddhaṃ kāryaṃ tathā param
SA15dhkprvku:04257_1: anagniś ced adhūmo asau sadhūmaś cet sapāvakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04260_1: siddha-udāharaṇā ity ukta-anupalabdhiḥ pṛthag na tu
SA15dhkprvku:04261_0: tatra apy adṛśyāt puruṣāt prāṇa-āder anivartanāt
SA15dhkprvku:04262_1: vastuny api tu pūrvābhyāṃ paryudāso vidhānataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04263_0: tatra upalabhyeṣv astitvam upalabdher na ca aparam
SA15dhkprvku:04265_0: tathā anyā na upalabhyeṣu na astitā anupalambhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:04266_0: siddho hi vyavahāro ayaṃ dṛśya-adṛṣṭāv asann iti
SA15dhkprvku:04266_1: tasyāḥ siddhāv asandigdhau tat-kāryatve api dhī-dhvanī
SA15dhkprvku:04267_0: vidyamāne hi viṣaye mohād atra ananubruvan
SA15dhkprvku:04270_1: buddher upalabhe vā iti kalpikāyāḥ samudbhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04271_0: viśeṣo gamyate arthānāṃ viśiṣṭād eva vedanāt
SA15dhkprvku:04272_0: tasmāt svato dhiyor bheda-siddhis tābhyāṃ tad-arthayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04272_1: anyathā hy anavasthānād bhedaḥ sidhyen na kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:04274_0: tasmād anupalambho ayaṃ svayaṃ pratyakṣato gataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04276_1: yathā aliṅgo anya-sattveṣu vikalpa-ādir na sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:04277_0: aniścaya-phalā hy eṣā na alaṃ vyāvṛtti-sādhane
SA15dhkprvku:04277_1: ādyā adhikriyate hetor niścayena eva sādhane
SA15dhkprvku:04278_0: tasyāḥ svayaṃ prayogeṣu svarūpaṃ vā prayujyate
SA15dhkprvku:04281_0: nāśanaṃ janayitvā anyaṃ sa hetus tasya nāśanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04281_1: tam eva naśvaraṃ bhāvaṃ janayed yadi kiṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:04282_0: ātma-upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tasya siddha-ātmanaḥ sataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04282_1: na ātma-upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tena yaḥ samapekṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:04283_0: anapekṣaś ca kiṃ bhāvo atathābhūtaḥ kadācana
SA15dhkprvku:04283_1: yathā na kṣepa-bhāg iṣṭaḥ sa eva udbhūta-nāśakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:04284_0: kṣaṇam apy anapekṣatve bhāvo bhāvasya na iti cet
SA15dhkprvku:04284_1: bhāvo hi sa tathābhūto abhāve bhāvas tathā katham
SA15dhkprvku:04286_3: prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva sva-dehe jarām
